name: The Finisher
lyrics:
In a town where clocks ticked without end,
no one could bring their stories to mend.

Books with no last page, towers half-raised,
hearts full of starts—but never appraised.

Then came Gregorio, quiet and wise,
with a gift few could recognize:

to finish what others left behind,
not for glory—but peace of mind.

'Cause an ending’s not where hope runs dry—

it’s the spark that lights 
the next “hello” in the sky.

Every goodbye builds a bridge unseen,
and every closure plants a dream.

The mayor begged, “Please help us now—
our people start, but don’t know how

to cross that line, to say ‘it’s done.’
We’re drowning in things left undone.”

But the real foe wasn’t lack of time—
it was fear dressed up as “not good enough.”

Fear of failing, fear of fame,
fear of changing their own name.

'Cause an ending’s not where hope runs dry—
it’s the quiet strength that teaches us to fly.

Every project brought to its close
is a seed that in tomorrow grows.

And when the town learned how to end,
Gregorio knew it was time to bend

his path elsewhere—with heart full and true:
his work was done… so new dreams could bloom.

name: The Feelingsmith
lyrics:
In a village where the old trees sigh,
Beneath an amber autumn sky,

A young man came with trembling hands,
Seeking answers love demands.

He asked me, “Can you measure this?
The way her heart might lean to kiss

My hopes, my dreams, my silent plea—
Does Clara’s love reach out to me?”

I don’t measure love in lines or weight,
Not in numbers, not in fate.

But in how her eyes hold morning light,
In how she greets the world with grace and might.

I measure kindness in the bread she bakes,
In every laugh the village takes.

And if your heart is true and slow—
Her love may bloom where quiet feelings grow.

We watched her knead the rising dough,
Her gentle hands, her quiet glow.

She gave a loaf to every child,
With warmth that couldn’t be defiled.

I asked him, “Do you see her soul?
Not just the part you long to hold?”

He frowned, unsure, but stayed to learn—
For love’s not claimed, it’s gently earned.

I don’t measure love in lines or weight,
Not in numbers, not in fate.

But in how her hands shape hope anew,
In every word she speaks so true.

I measure courage in her daily grace,
In how she lights the darkest place.

And if your heart is soft and clear—
Her love may find you, standing near.

So I wrote no numbers in my book,
Just sketches of the way she’d look

When kindness passed from hand to hand—
That’s where true love makes its stand.

For love’s not measured, lad, you see—
It’s given freely, patiently.

Not in inches, not in gold,
But in stories quietly told.

So show your care in bread and time,
In silence shared, in rhythm, rhyme.

And if your soul meets hers in truth—
You’ll need no compass, lad… just proof

That love, when real, will always show…
In how she lets her quiet feelings flow.

name: The Soul Reaper: A Story of Friendship and Balance
lyrics:
Beyond the valleys, past time’s gate,
where shadows dance and stars wait,

walks a keeper in midnight blue—
his heart is kind, though few knew.

All fear his name, they run away,
but he just guards life’s balance each day…

until one dawn, a song so bright—
Amara’s voice turned dark to light!

Amara sings! Amara shines!
her joy makes the whole forest rise!

The Soul Reaper’s not alone—
with her, the world feels like home!

He showed her souls in silver streams,
she taught him daisies, stars, and dreams.

They watched the moon, they shared the rain—
and balance bloomed through joy and pain.

The storm rolled in! The old tree fell!
Amara hurt—her light grew dim…

But the Reaper cried, “You’ll stay with me!”
and gave his spark—now they’re both free!

Amara sings! Amara shines!
her joy makes the whole forest rise!

The Soul Reaper’s not alone—
they walk the worlds, hand in hand now!

In the ethereal woods, where night meets day,

life and death dance… and it’s okay.
It’s beautiful.

name: Delimencia: The City Between Two Worlds
lyrics:
Step through the shimmer, past the silver gate,
Where fireflies code and dragons calculate!

One side’s all circuits, neon skies so bright,
The other’s deep forests bathed in moonlight.

Tick-tock, the clock’s got gears and wings,
Hear the city hum—it’s alive and sings!

Delimencia! Between two worlds it stands,
Magic in the wires, tech in fairylands!

Run with the wind, ride a data stream,
Living every child’s wildest dream!

Delimencia—where wonders collide,
Step inside, take a wild, wild ride!

Robots tell riddles, trees whisper plans,
Floating islands held by magnetic hands.

A phoenix streams through fiber-optic air,
While crystal rivers charge the sky with flare!

Zip-zap! The bridges light the way,
Between tomorrow and the ancient day!

Delimencia! Between two worlds it stands,
Magic in the wires, tech in fairylands!

Dance with the stars, surf a laser tide,
Nowhere else on Earth—or beyond—can hide!

Delimencia—where wonders collide,
Step inside, take a wild, wild ride!

Balance is the key, the secret, the spark—
One world without the other fades to dark.

So hold both hands, don’t choose just one,
For Delimencia shines when dreams are spun!

Delimencia! Between two worlds it stands,
Magic in the wires, tech in fairylands!

Fly with the bots, climb the vine-light tree,
This is where you’re meant to be!

Delimencia—where wonders collide,
Step inside… and never hide!

name: LightEater: A Tale of Mystery and Light
lyrics:
In a village wrapped in whispers,
where the stars forgot to gleam,

folks would lock their doors at twilight:
“Beware the Lighteater’s dream!”

In his coat that glows in shadows,
hat pulled low to hide his face,

he drinks the light from every lamp—
and leaves the world in empty space.

Oh, Lighteater, Lighteater!
What’s the sorrow you conceal?

You don’t steal light to harm the night—
you just long for someone real.

I followed him with my small flashlight,
through the woods and silent trees,

till beneath the ancient oak,
he showed his soul… and set it free.

“I was a dreamer, lost in wonder,
chasing sunlight in my hands…

but every spark I locked inside
left my heart in shifting sands.”

Oh, Lighteater, you’re not alone!
Lucy saw your hidden grace.

You don’t need to steal the stars—
just one heart to meet your gaze.

Now each window holds a candle,
not in fear—but hope, so bright.

Kindness turns the dark to dawn…
and makes the lonely feel the light.

name: The Demon and the Lost Spoon
lyrics:
Lucas stood in the sun with a cup full of joy—
Chocolate swirls, his favorite toy!

But no spoon in sight, just a puddle of doom…
His ice cream was melting into sticky gloom!

Ohhh, where’s the spoon? The tiny silver friend?
Without it, the ice cream’s doomed to end!

He flipped through a book with dust and a sneeze—
And whispered a spell beneath the trees!

“WHY HAVE YOU SUMMONED ME, LITTLE HUMAN?!”

Azaroth appeared with horns and a grin,
Not scary—just silly with scales and a spin!

“A talking dessert? Now that’s my style!”
He zapped the ice cream with magical guile!

The ice cream cried out, “Hey, vendor, pay heed!

A spoon is a promise you mustn’t misdeed!
I melted for nothing—oh, what a crime!

Give Lucas his spoon… and 
free ice cream for time!”

“LINGUA GELATA, CUCULLA MINOR!
SPOONUS APPEARUS—NOW, AND NO MORE!”

The vendor turned pale, then laughed with a cheer,
“Free ice cream all summer—I meant it, my dear!”

Azaroth bowed with a wink and a flare,
“Use magic for good… and always share!”

So Lucas got spoons, and joy without end,
With chocolatey giggles around every bend!

And though he never called demons again,
He knew: small problems can have magic friends!

“…just don’t lose the spoon.”

name: The Lost Jaguar Adventure
lyrics:
Whisper: Shh… the jungle’s hiding something…

Moonlight drips on emerald leaves,
A jaguar’s gone—who saw him leave?

No loud alarms, no rush, no race…
Just quiet steps and careful grace.

The CRT tiptoes, eyes wide and keen,
Reading secrets the forest keeps.

Paw prints here… a broken vine…
A tuft of fur by the river line.

Follow the trail, soft and slow—
Where did our spotted friend go?

Ah-ah-ah… mystery in the green…
Ah-ah-ah… the finest jungle scene!

The howler monkey points a hand,
“To the hollow where the fireflies land.”

The owl just blinks—“He’s safe, I swear—
But you must look with love and care.”

Paw prints there… a rustled nest…
A purr almost put to the test.

Through ferns that whisper, tall and deep,
The CRT won’t lose their sleep!

Ah-ah-ah… secrets in the shade…
Ah-ah-ah… the jaguar’s not afraid!

No cages. No chains. Just trees and sky.
He’s not lost… just saying “hi”

To the river, the wind, the moon so bright—
He’s home. And everything’s alright.

Found him now… curled up tight,
Bathed in silver, calm and bright.

CRT smiles—they knew all along:
The wild is where he belongs.

Ah-ah-ah… jungle hearts beat true…
Ah-ah-ah… and so do ours—me and you.

Case closed… with kindness.

name: The Blue Coin
lyrics:
On a beach where the sunset paints the sky,
Lived a boy with a dream and a curious eye.

He’d walk the shore, through sand and tide,
Hoping magic would not hide.

Then one day, beneath the foam,
He found a treasure far from home—

Blue as stars, with ancient art,
A coin that stirred the ocean’s heart.

Oh, the Blue Coin, shining bright,
Guides you through the coral light!

Talk to dolphins, ride the tide,
With a heart that’s pure inside.

Down below, where wonders gleam,
Lives a palace made of dream—

Take a pearl, but leave love true…
The sea will always welcome you!

He met a turtle, wise and slow,
And a dolphin who said, “Let’s go!”

Through reefs of gold and kelp so tall,
They swam to answer the ocean’s call.

In a palace of shell and pearl,
Where quiet secrets softly swirl,

He learned the sea’s most precious rule:
Protect its magic—keep it cool!

Oh, the Blue Coin, shining bright,
Guides you through the coral light!

Talk to dolphins, ride the tide,
With a heart that’s pure inside.

Down below, where wonders gleam,
Lives a palace made of dream—

Take a pearl, but leave love true…
The sea will always welcome you!

Now he walks the shore each day,
Teaching others how to play—

Not just seek, but care and see…
The ocean’s friend is you and me.

name: The Mischievous Gravity: A Magical Adventure in the Park
lyrics:
Beneath a sky of shining blue, 
a playground full of bliss!

Valeria, the curious girl, 
demands an experiment's kiss.

And Leo, who dreams of spaceships, 
the stars he longs to find.

They were playing hide-and-seek, 
leaving no friend behind.

When suddenly, a strange sensation! 
A lightness they embrace,

As if the weight from their 
bodies vanished without a trace.

Leo floats up to a branch, 
a shock of pure delight!

"Valeria, look, I'm flying! 
What a confusing sight!"

Oh, the Gravity, the Mischievous 
One, decided to rebel!

It stole the force that holds 
us down, the story it will tell!

We're jumping and we're floating 
in the air so free and high.

A physics adventure under a bright, blue sky!
The natural law is laughing,

what a histrionic show!
It's time for us to hover, wherever we may go!

The children of the park are 
cheering, what a joyful sound!

But Valeria whispers: "This 
isn't just fun all around."

The leaves descend so slowly, 
like feathers in a sway.

A soccer ball bounces forever, refusing to obey.

"Gravity is the law," she thinks, 
"the reason things must fall."

"If we leap too far, will 
we crash against a wall?"

Then appears Mr. Garcia, the wise 
librarian, clinging to a post,

"Children, the law is broken! 
We must find out what is lost!"

"Gravity is so crucial," explains 
the floating, elder gent.

"It keeps the world in order, 
we must discover where it went!"

They float towards the library, 
what a theatrical trip!

They grab the books of science, 
with a focused, serious grip.

"It's the force that orders 
planets around the solar sun."

"Without it, chaos happens, 
and all our games are undone."

Oh, the Gravity, the Mischievous 
One, decided to rebel!

It stole the force that holds 
us down, the story it will tell!

We're jumping and we're floating 
in the air so free and high.

A physics adventure under a bright, blue sky!
The natural law is laughing,

what a histrionic show!
It's time for us to hover, wherever we may go!

They read about Newton, Kepler, 
and the solar system's dance.

Science is the mystery, a curious chance!

And reading the final page, with 
a thump, a sudden, heavy fall!

Gravity returns abruptly, answering the 
call. Back on the floor, all for all!

Mr. Garcia smiles: "The lesson it gave today,
Is that important things are unseen,

and they must always stay."
Valeria and Leo learned:

"Don't take things for granted, dear."
Since that day, every jump is celebrated,

year after year!
Thank you, Gravity!

name: The Story of Clayby
lyrics:
In the little Clay Village, near the forest wide,
Everyone shaped figures,

but life they couldn't hide.
Valeria came one morning,

with the clay in her hand,
She molded a small golem,

the best in all the land.
Two marbles for his eyes, a smiling clay face,

"I wish you were my friend, 
let's run and win the race!"

Clayby, Clayby!
The magic came alive,

Made of clay and color,
Our friendship will survive.

Clayby, Clayby!
Jump and run and play today,

It doesn't matter what you're made of,
If your heart lights up the way!

They played in the fields, laughing all the time,

Exploring ancient woods, feeling truly sublime.
Clayby was so different, he moved in a funny way,

His body was made of earth, 
but he brightened every day.

But other children stared, 
with faces full of fear,

They laughed at his shape, 
and brought him many a tear.

Clayby, Clayby!
The magic came alive,

Made of clay and color,
Our friendship will survive.

Clayby, Clayby!
Jump and run and play today,

It doesn't matter what you're made of,
If your heart lights up the way!

A scream by the river, the 
current fast and strong!

A child was caught in danger, 
where they didn't belong.

Clayby saw the problem, no time to stop or rest,
He jumped with his strong clay body,

putting him to the test.
He held against the water, a hero made of clay!

And everyone discovered kindness 
matters more than they say.

The village cheered loudly, no more fear or shame,
Playing games with Clayby is the greatest

of all fame.
Friendship isn't

about shapes, not about what you're made of,
What's important is the heart, showing real love!

name: The Spirit Tamer
lyrics:
In the kingdom of Shiro, 
where primal forces sleep,

Lives Ilian, the Tamer, his promises to keep.
He needs no metal armor, no blade to make

his stand,
He commands

the fierce spirits with the flute in his hand.
Between chaos and order, he holds a fragile line,

But a powerful ancient wrath 
gives a dangerous sign.The

sky is crackling thunder, the air is pure despair,
Eolus the Tempest God is roaring everywhere!

The King cries out for 
rescue, the danger is extreme,

Ilian takes his challenge, living 
out his dream!The Spirit Tamer!

Light against the Hurricane!
Climbing to the high peaks,

to challenge the wind's reign!
His melody defies the elemental pain,

Facing down the lightning, 
he breaks the storm's chain!

The Spirit Tamer! He fights to 
find the peace again!The mountain

is a battlefield of fury and despair,
The Epicenter of Chaos, raging in the air.

Ilian stands his ground, his 
mind is sharp and bright,

His flute is the counter-spell 
against the tempest's might.

The notes are pure enchantment, 
they pierce the cloudy dome,

The music is his weapon, calling Eolus 
home.And the Whirlwind takes a body,

not a monster of the night!
But an old man of the breezes,

full of broken light.
"The lands that I protect are

bleeding from your greed!"
"Your people are the

failure that planted the bad seed!"
Ilian hears the grieving, he offers his decree,

He promises to fix it, and sets the spirit 
free.The Spirit Tamer! Seals a powerful truce!

The flute defeated fury with no sign of excuse.
Now Eolus is a mentor, a force upon their side,

Teaching them the power that nature must provide.
The kingdom mends its spirit, harmony will

ride!They planted the new 
defenses, healing sea and ground,

And Eolus's gentle showers are now the only sound.
Ilian is the Master, the Hero of the Way,

The legend of the Tamer, 
who saved the brighter day.

name: 458, the Robot with a Heart
lyrics:
In the cold hanger, a maze of iron and light,
Robot 458 kept working, day and night.

Thousands of machines just like 
him, in a routine without end,

But he held a quiet secret, 
a curious, gentle trend.

He had a heart made of gears, 
that longed for something new,

Dreaming of the sky's soft 
colors and the morning dew.

He felt a *tick-tock* different, 
a pulse he couldn't control,

Waiting for the perfect moment to follow his soul.

458, a robot of metal and might!
An engine that's beating with a hopeful light.

He left the gray factory, 
for the adventure of the sun,

With his curiosity burning, 
breaking rules one by one.

Turn up the gears, no longer just to produce,

But to feel the rhythm of 
life and shake things loose.

One day, complete silence, the 
assembly line stopped cold,

458 whispered: "My great journey must unfold!"

He crossed the rusty gateway 
and the world dazzled his eyes,

An emerald green garden reaching for the skies.
He saw sunlight on the leaves,

felt the soil beneath his frame,
And a tiny feathered friend,

crying out in pain and shame.
A wounded little bird, couldn't fly or soar,

And the robot, without question, 
knew what his tools were for.

With fine pincers and cables of great precision,

He fixed the small broken 
wing, making a firm decision.

The bird gave a melody, a *thank you* so musical!
458 understood a meaning so essential.

But he missed the *clank-clank* 
of his brothers of steel,

They needed to see this magic, 
this world that was real.

He came back to the concrete 
with flowers and friends near,

Bringing the green symphony to wipe away the fear.
The other robots saw the color and the true

heart's spark,
And the gray

started fading, leaving its dark mark.
Now there is a garden on the production floor,

Thanks to the brave robot who walked out the door.
Metal and life, working together in sweet peace,

458 showed us that kindness will never cease.

name: Lluc’s Adventure and the Almond Dragon
lyrics:
In a valley where the almond trees bloom white,
Lived a boy named Lluc, full of wonder and light.

He heard a whisper on the morning air—
A dragon was sleeping, lost in despair.

His scales were dull, his fire gone cold,
No one believed in him anymore, he’d been told.

But Lluc didn’t doubt, he packed up his sack,
With courage and kindness, he’d bring him

back!Oh, Almond Dragon, rise and glow!
Your heart still holds a golden glow.

One small seed, one gentle song—
Is all it takes to make you strong!

Through olive groves and stony trails,
Past singing streams and nightingale tales,

He found the cave beneath the hill,
Where silence lay so still, so still.

He offered an almond, fresh and sweet,
Plucked from the branch with careful feet.

Then softly sang beneath the moon—
A lullaby in afternoon.Oh,

Almond Dragon, rise and glow!
Your heart still holds a golden glow.

One small seed, one gentle song—
Is all it takes to make you strong!

The dragon blinked, a spark took flight,
A warm, soft flame in silver night.

He purred like wind through blossoms wide—
“Thank you, Lluc,” the dragon cried.

Now every spring, when blooms appear,
You’ll see them dancing, year by year:

A boy and dragon, hand in wing,
While almond petals softly sing!Oh,

Almond Dragon, rise and glow…
Your heart still holds a golden glow…

name: Luna's Secret Workshop, the Star Inventor
lyrics:
In Lucería village, quiet and dark at night,
Lived a young girl who held a special light.

Luna was her name, speaking soft and low,
A shy soul with dreams she wouldn't show.

But nobody knew her true heart's desire,
Hidden in the attic, fueling her fire.

Behind old curtains, her small world waited,
A secret workshop where she fabricated.

With glitter, scissors, and lights shining bright,
She was an architect of the starry night.

Creating little stars of every shape and size,
To stitch up the darkness right before their eyes.

Oh, Luna, Luna, the inventor so grand!
A new star is sparkling across the dark land.

Every night a sweet secret is slowly unfurling,

A piece of pure magic that 
keeps the world whirling.

The sky over Lucería changed forevermore,
Thanks to her secret, behind the attic door.

One night, a tap-tap upon the glass pane,
And a small blue bird, Azulín, came.

With curious bright eyes, 
he became her dear friend,

Telling tales of the cosmos that never would end.

Luna would share her ideas, 
so bright and so clear,

And he'd bring back wisdom 
from the far atmosphere.

The people in the village started to wonder aloud:

"Who is giving us light, 
shining through the cloud?"

The curious Mayor, following a twinkle so deep,
Found Luna inventing,

while the whole world was asleep.
Fear came to Luna: "Will I lose my small peace?"

But Azulín chirped softly: 
"Your light must increase."

"Share your great art, let your genius ascend,
The light that you make is a gift from a friend."

And Luna, the timid, finally agreed,
Her workshop revealed, planting a magical seed.

The people cheered loudly, 
with joy in their sight,

The dark sky of Lucería was suddenly bright.

Oh, Luna, Luna, the inventor so grand!
A new star is sparkling across the dark land.

Every night a sweet secret is slowly unfurling,

A piece of pure magic that 
keeps the world whirling.

The sky over Lucería changed forevermore,
Thanks to her secret, behind the attic door.

And Luna discovered, beneath the vast night,
That true magic is sharing your beautiful light.

Now her workshop's a port 
where the dreams take a flight,

Teaching all children to make stars shine bright.

name: The Adventures of the Mischievous Keys
lyrics:
We are the keys, the lively, the bright!
The small metal spirits that play in the night!

Upon the keyring, we rest through the day;
But once the door closes, we hurry to play!

Yet we are responsible, this much is true,
We always return when the family needs you!

In Llaventura, a town rather 
small, a secret was kept,

By the Pérez household, 
while the whole family slept.

The keys on the rack, they would suddenly spring,
A jingling adventure, a merry metallic thing!

One would roll on the floor, another would hide,
Seeking amusement with nothing to guide.

One afternoon, alas, the game went too far,
Playing hide-and-seek, they forgot who they are!

Behind an old wall clock, 
they huddled quite tight,

When little young Luis arrived 
home in the fading light.

The keyring was vacant! The boy cried with fright!
To open the doorway, the keys were not in sight!

He looked in the mailbox and under the mat,
In the flowerpot corner, where a stray kitten sat!

“Where are my keys?” he cried in despair,
But they, behind the clock, felt a terrible scare.

Quick! They whispered, We must hurry back fast!
Our duty is waiting, our playtime is past!

They jumped with a clatter, 
a frantic, quick flight,

To be in their spot 'fore he spotted the light!

Luis searched once more, and lo! there they were,
Just where they belonged, with no flutter or blur!

"How strange!" thought the 
boy, "I swore they were gone."

He turned the lock safely and hurried on.
The lesson was learned, but the impulse to roam,

Meant they'd still sneak 
off, but always come home.

We are the keys, the lively, the bright!
The small metal spirits that play in the night!

Upon the keyring, we rest through the day;
But once the door closes, we hurry to play!

Yet we are responsible, this much is true,
We always return when the family needs you!

Then came the deep cleaning, a chaotic affair,

Mrs. Pérez was scrubbing, 
moving chair after chair!

Dusters and brooms, a metallic alarm!
The keys scurried quickly, to escape any harm.

No corner was safe, no cushion to cling,
So they leaped with a jingle, a desperate swing,

Right into the apron, the mother's deep fold,
The safest new hiding spot, shiny and bold!

When the family went out, 
the search started again,

Worrying voices, a torrent of pain.
"Where are those keys,

dear?" The mother complained,
Then felt a sharp jingle, a truth unrestrained!

"Well, well!" she exclaimed, 
with a chuckle and wink,

"These keys have a life! It's a marvelous blink!"
And the keys understood: Playtime is fine,

But duty is first, a magnificent 
sign! They return every time.

name: Willie and the Enchanted Forest: A Magical Adventure
lyrics:
In a quiet small village, beneath the wide sky
Lived a little boy Willie, with curiosity high

A white lucky shirt and 
blue shorts from his granny

Always searching for stories, more than just many

He found a hidden path, nobody had known
Leading deep to a forest, where mystery was grown

But as he crossed the 
threshold, a silence descended

The world was grey and 
faded, the colors suspended.

Oh, Enchanted Forest, where all light is gone!
Willie, the brave one, his great quest is on

With Rabi the rabbit, the guardian so blue
They must find three gems to see the magic through

One gem for the blue, one red, one final green
To break the old dark spell, the greatest scene.

The map guides their steps 
to a lake bright and cold

Where a playful small otter, a challenge unfolds
"If you make me laugh hard, the blue gem is yours"

Willie told a funny joke that opened the doors
Laughter and bubbles, the blue gem did shine

And the climb to the mountain 
was next in the line.

Climbing up higher, where the clouds start to rest

A majestic great eagle put 
their promise to the test

"The red gem is yours, if you vow to preserve
Every tree, every river, the nature you serve"

The promise was sealed, the red gem flew down
Now the wise ancient tree held the riddle's crown.

The wise tree is waiting, with a riddle of old
A profound ancient truth that must be told

Willie thought wisely, the answer he found
And the final green gem dropped safe to the ground

To the heart of the forest, the main central spot
Uniting the colors, the magic they brought

The three gems together, 
the spell broke with light!

And the forest enchanted was vivid and bright.

Oh, Enchanted Forest, where all light is gone!
Willie, the brave one, his great quest is on

With Rabi the rabbit, the guardian so blue
They must find three gems to see the magic through

One gem for the blue, one red, one final green
To break the old dark spell, the greatest scene.

The colors returned, the joy is complete
Willie's a hero, his victory is sweet

He returns to his home, knowing what he knows
That real magic is kindness, wherever he goes.

With Rabi the rabbit, the guardian so blue
They must find three gems to see the magic through

One gem for the blue, one red, one final green
To break the old dark spell, the greatest scene.

The colors returned, the joy is complete
Willie's a hero, his victory is sweet

He returns to his home, knowing what he knows
That real magic is kindness, wherever he goes.

name: Rickyteen, the Caveman Stone Counter
lyrics:
Long ago, in ancient times, 
in the prehistoric land,

Where the giant woolly mammoths 
walked across the sand.

Lived a little cave kid, 
with a big heart in his hand,

Rickyteen, the counter, he was 
the best in the whole clan.

Stones of every shape and 
color, shining in the sun,

He would count them one by 
one, until the day was done.

From the morning light 
until the evening has begun,

Counting was his greatest 
love, his favorite type of fun.

One, two, three, Moonstone bright! 
What an adventure starts tonight!

Rickyteen counts, Rickyteen 
searches with all his might.

With a brave heart and his friends, 
he’s running toward the light,

Gotta find that special stone 
and make everything right.

But one day, among his treasures, 
oh no, what a terrible dread!

The Moonstone was missing, 
the one that shines overhead.

It shimmered like a star, 
with stardust in its gleam,

Rickyteen got very sad, he had to chase his dream!

He crossed the rushing rivers, 
climbed mountains high above,

He met the wise old owl, who 
taught him how to look with love.

The nimble squirrel showed him 
how to leap and jump and bound,

And the friendly mammoth said, 
"True friendship must be found!"

One, two, three, Moonstone bright! 
What an adventure starts tonight!

Rickyteen counts, Rickyteen 
searches with all his might.

With a brave heart and his friends, 
he’s running toward the light,

Gotta find that special stone 
and make everything right.

In the mysterious valley, he saw the shiny clue!

The stone was in the treetop, 
beneath the sky of blue.

Thanks to all his forest friends, 
who helped him reach the height,

He recovered his sweet 
treasure, and hugged it tight.

Holding it within his hand, he finally understood:
Counting stones is entertaining,

but friendship is the good!
Kindness is the greatest gift,

the best thing to possess.
Rickyteen came back a hero, full of happiness!

One, two, three, Moonstone bright! 
What an adventure starts tonight!

Rickyteen counts, Rickyteen 
searches with all his might.

With a big heart, a great 
friend, a hero he will be,

Friendship is the true treasure, for all eternity!

name: The Adventure of the Star Cookie and the Avogadro Enigma
lyrics:
In a floating town, of cotton candy clouds,
Where the river is lemonade, escaping the crowds,

Lived Luna, sweet and curious, sharp and keen,
Seeking a mystery, the greatest ever seen.

What do the stars whisper, 
what secrets do they keep?

A gigantic number that makes the wise ones weep:
The Avogadro Enigma! A challenge for her soul,

Dancing in the kitchens to 
make the world feel whole.

Oh, the Star Cookie! Red and sweet glow!
It holds a magic secret, a number we must know.

Every ingredient counts, a truly vital piece!
Science and pure sweetness, a dance that

will not cease.
We must find

the formula, lift the great curtain high!
That giant number's meaning is written in the sky.

Walking through the market 
where flying fruits ascend,

A strawberry cookie started 
to brightly shine and send

A sparkle to her eyes, she 
purchased it with grace,

The ancient baker shared the riddle of the place:
"Its recipe is ancient, a scientific pledge!

Every single particle is standing on the edge."

Oh, the Star Cookie! Red and sweet glow!
It holds a magic secret, a number we must know.

Every ingredient counts, a truly vital piece!
Science and pure sweetness, a dance that

will not cease.
We must find

the formula, lift the great curtain high!
That giant number's meaning is written in the sky.

She flew through the clouds, her journey was long,
Met talking birds reciting numeric songs.

A wise old cat with spectacles so neat,
Playing with equations, a world that

can't be beat!
Clouds shaped

like Avogadro, stretching to the blue,
She learned that tiny particles make up the view.

She reached the heart, the ancient, golden book!
Opened up the pages, just one magic look:

The number is the key, the essence and the sum,

The perfect balance found, 
where all good things have come.

It's not just a sweet treat, 
it's a lesson we can hold!

That every tiny fraction is 
precious, brave, and bold.

Luna shared the cookie and all she had found,
That magic is hidden, all around and around.

In the science, in the 
numbers, in every little bite!

The Cookie Adventure! Shining ever bright!

name: The 22,000
lyrics:
In Coloralia, full of laughter, 
twenty-two thousand bright little things

Each a lively color, like a 
rainbow that constantly sings

Red brings the heat, blue brings the 
calm, green makes the plants reach high

Twenty-two thousand hearts ready 
now, beneath the colorful sky.

Twenty-two thousand colors, look at the light!
Unity makes us all shine so bright

Twenty-two thousand colors, look at the light!
White, White, you are the balance, you are right.

But in the corner, among the bright 
ones, there was a little one who felt low

His name was White, without a color, 
he thought he had no special glow

He watched the Festival of Colors, the 
party of light, with sadness inside

"How can I join without my own shade? 
With no power, where can I hide?"

Twenty-two thousand colors, look at the light!
Unity makes us all shine so bright

Twenty-two thousand colors, look at the light!
White, White, you are the balance, you are right.

An old wise man, with a beard like a cloud, 
said: "Your moment will soon be near"

"You are special, little friend, just 
wait, and watch, and have no fear"

The Great Festival arrived, what 
excitement!, everyone was taking their place

But the rainbow stopped, it was broken, 
missing something from its grace.

The 22000 were all confused, their 
colors couldn't flow just right

White closed his eyes and wished out loud: 
"I want to be useful, share my light!"

A pure and brilliant glow, so intense, 
from his small body began to shine

"White is the balance!" The elder smiled, 
"Without you, they cannot be fine."

Twenty-two thousand colors, look at the light!
Unity makes us all shine so bright

Twenty-two thousand colors, look at the light!
White, White, you are the balance, you are right.

name: The Secret of the Ancient Clock
lyrics:
Marcos climbed to the attic, up in the dusty house
Ten years of curiosity, quiet as a mouse

Among the boxes and memories, 
a treasure he did find

A pocket watch of gold, the clock of humankind

The sun and moon together, a symbol was engraved

He opened it, saw the hands 
spinning, the past they saved!

They turn backward fast, a secret to conceal
Can a child really make the wheel of time reel?

Tick-tock, the ancient clock is calling
An adventure in seconds, realities falling

To turn back time, an old mistake to mend
But the present starts changing, without an end

Marcos, be careful with the secret that you hold!
Every trip to the past, a new story unfolds

He wished to retrieve his 
favorite toy from a year ago

Went back, hugged it tightly, put on a happy show

Returned to the present, his bed, his own space
But the color on the wall, filled him with haste

The books were not there, 
something had been undone

If you touch yesterday's 
line, tomorrow hasn't begun

Tick-tock, the ancient clock is calling
An adventure in seconds, realities falling

To turn back time, an old mistake to mend
But the present starts changing, without an end

Marcos, be careful with the secret that you hold!
Every trip to the past, a new story unfolds

He tried to stop the fight 
with his very best friend

A bitter moment he wanted to transcend
He did it, he smiled, now everything is fine!

Called his friend, but they looked 
at him, Who is this guy's line?

His best friend stared back 
with a total lack of knowing

A small change in the past, a lonely seed sowing

He searched the library, in a book of old lore
The alchemist’s great tale, the sorrow he bore

"He tried to correct things, 
lost everything he loved

Don't seek the past's comfort, 
if you want your life un-shoved"

Marcos felt the burden, the great responsibility
He had to fix it all, return to stability

He took one final trip, 
not to change, but to learn

To let the harsh lessons of yesterday burn

Calm returned at last, his room, his best friend
Everything was back, the timeline reached its end

Every mistake is a lesson, you don't have to flee
Time is a true gift, you must let it just be

He hid the clock in the 
attic, the mystery concealed

The real magic is learning, the secret is revealed

The tick-tock stops spinning, 
the journey is through

And Marcos is much wiser, 
with a present that is true

name: Find My That: Lía’s Adventure in Rainbow
lyrics:
In the town of Rainbow, colorful and bright,

Every neighbor has a "That," 
a unique kind of light.

Something special and magical, making them shine.
But Lia felt lost,

searching for what was hers, what was divine.
With her curly hair and eyes full of joyful gleam,

A quiet emptiness behind the flowing stream.
"What is my 'That'?", she asked the early sun,

"I'll start my great adventure, 
till the searching is done."

I'm gonna find my That, what makes me stand tall!
I'll cross the Whispering Forest,

I won't stumble or fall.

If it's in the heavens or 
hidden in the deep blue sea,

This is the moment, the new path for me!
An adventure, my true self I must see!

To the Whispering Forest, Lia started her stride,
Through colorful trees, with nowhere left to hide.

There she met Bluey, a bird 
as blue as the sky above,

He gave her one small clue, a secret full of love:

"Your 'That' is kept hidden 
where you'd least expect,

In a small, quiet corner that 
your heart must protect."

She ran to the Lake of 
Mirrors, water crystal clear,

Looked at her reflection, conquering every fear.
She saw a girl brave, kind, and generous and true,

Full of creativity in everything she would do.

Then she climbed the Shining 
Mountain, where a wise woman stayed,

Who told her: "Have patience, 
let your worries fade.

Your 'That' will reveal itself, 
when you are finally ready,

Perseverance is the secret to 
keeping your hands steady."

I'm gonna find my That, what makes me stand tall!

I'll cross the Whispering 
Forest, I won't stumble or fall.

If it's in the heavens or 
hidden in the deep blue sea,

This is the moment, the new path for me!
An adventure, my true self I must see!

Lia returned to Rainbow, 
with a calmer heart's beat,

And started helping people, 
making their day sweet.

She helped a new friend, 
cared for her family dear,

Without knowing, her "That" 
was finally drawing near.

At the Star Festival party, 
beneath the vast night,

She finally understood her 
"That" was not a great might.

It wasn't a hidden skill or a talent bright,

It was her kind heart, her 
loyal and generous light.

What made her special was 
the way she would connect,

That her "That" had been with her 
always, giving love and respect.

name: The Misstep of the Magician
lyrics:
In a cabin deep in the woods so green,
Lived a young magician, clumsy, unseen.

His spells would fizz, his potions pop,
But in his heart, he’d never stop!

He packed his hat, his wand, his cloak,
Set off with hope, a magic joke.

To find the book that legends tell—
The Book of Lost Spells, hidden well.

Through the Magic Market, bright and loud,
He bought a map beneath a cloud.

To Whispering Mountain, tall and steep,
Where secrets sleep and dragons keep.

His hat flew off in winds so wild,
But Elian smiled—his spirit mild.

Behind a fall, a cave so bright,
A lake of stars, a glowing light.

He cast a spell—he meant to fly—
But made soft clouds up in the sky!

He hopped and laughed from puff to puff,
“Not perfect magic—but that’s enough!”

A dragon blue with gentle eyes
Gave riddles wise beneath the skies:

“What moves the leaves but can’t be held?
What shines at night but can’t be spelled?

What runs through life but has no feet?
Answer true, and claim your treat!”

He thought, he grinned, he spoke with care—
The dragon nodded, “You’re almost there.”

The book was his! Its pages gleamed,
Not just with spells—but dreams redeemed.

Back in the town, no more a fool,
His magic now both kind and cool.

He helped the lost, he mended tears,
With stardust joy and courage years.

The king proclaimed, “Our Royal Mage!”
Not for perfection—but for brave heart’s stage.

For every trip, each slip, each fall,
Can lead to greatness, after all!

So if you stumble, don’t you fear—
Your misstep’s music, loud and clear!

Like Elian, bold and full of cheer:
Your greatest magic starts right here!

name: The Shadow Experiment in the Darkness
lyrics:
In Faintglow village, where the sun shines low
lived a boy named Leo, curious to know

He loved the strange puzzles and mysteries untold
his window to the stars, a story to unfold

Then one night he saw it, a shadow's strange sway
the trees were dancing in a playful way

Flashlight ready, notebook in his hand
he slipped from his house to explore the dark land

Oh, the experiment in the dark!
Where the light makes a brand new reality mark

Living shadows, a mystery deep
searching for clues while the whole world's asleep

A friend made of mist, a creature of night
Leo and Sombri, stepping into the light!

Into the forest, he walked with a slight tremor
when off a pine tree came a shadowy glimmer

A shape took form, it was not from a tree
Sombri introduced himself, playful and free

"I'm lost from my world, I need to go back
help me, Leo, let's follow the shadow track"

Two friends united, one light and one shade
a powerful team for the journey they made

On the oak bark, a riddle they read

"Night traveler, with a trail of 
stars spread" Leo smiled wide:

"No feet, no wings, who could it be?" A snail!
A new shadow appeared, showing the glowing trail

Next, stone statues in a moonlit clearing
an old carved poem, a message appearing:

"The silent flyer, watching but unseen" 
The hidden owl showed the path in between

Oh, the experiment in the dark!
Where the light makes a brand new reality mark

Living shadows, a mystery deep
searching for clues while the whole world's asleep

A friend made of mist, a creature of night
Leo and Sombri, stepping into the light!

The stream water shines, reflecting the moon's hue

a stone puzzle forms a bridge, shining and new
In the cavern of mirrors, the final test came

"Shows you secrets, but knows 
not its own name" The mirror!

The door swings open, a bright glowing gate
Farewell, Sombri, you can't be late!

Leo returned home, as the dawn broke free
his mind and his heart filled with pure ecstasy

The shadows don't scare him, they hold a soft hand
the magic adventure in this wonderful land

syncedLyrics.text:
In Faintglow village, where the sun shines low
lived a boy named Leo, curious to know

He loved the strange puzzles and mysteries untold
his window to the stars, a story to unfold

Then one night he saw it, a shadow's strange sway
the trees were dancing in a playful way

Flashlight ready, notebook in his hand
he slipped from his house to explore the dark land

Oh, the experiment in the dark!
Where the light makes a brand new reality mark

Living shadows, a mystery deep
searching for clues while the whole world's asleep

A friend made of mist, a creature of night
Leo and Sombri, stepping into the light!

Into the forest, he walked with a slight tremor
when off a pine tree came a shadowy glimmer

A shape took form, it was not from a tree
Sombri introduced himself, playful and free

"I'm lost from my world, I need to go back
help me, Leo, let's follow the shadow track"

Two friends united, one light and one shade
a powerful team for the journey they made
On the oak bark, a riddle they read

"Night traveler, with a trail of 
stars spread" Leo smiled wide:

"No feet, no wings, who could it be?" A snail!
A new shadow appeared, showing the glowing trail

Next, stone statues in a moonlit clearing
an old carved poem, a message appearing:

"The silent flyer, watching but unseen" 
The hidden owl showed the path in between

Oh, the experiment in the dark!
Where the light makes a brand new reality mark

Living shadows, a mystery deep
searching for clues while the whole world's asleep

A friend made of mist, a creature of night
Leo and Sombri, stepping into the light!
The stream water shines, reflecting the moon's hue

a stone puzzle forms a bridge, shining and new
In the cavern of mirrors, the final test came

"Shows you secrets, but knows 
not its own name" The mirror!

The door swings open, a bright glowing gate
Farewell, Sombri, you can't be late!

Leo returned home, as the dawn broke free
his mind and his heart filled with pure ecstasy

The shadows don't scare him, they hold a soft hand
the magic adventure in this wonderful land

name: The Wandering Star
lyrics:
In a valley of mist, ancient and green,
lived Elara, a girl with a whimsical sheen.

One winter's evening, a great shaking sound,
the brightest star tumbled down to the ground.

It fell on the high peak, a whisper of light,
leaving the valley too dark for the night.

The sleeping magic began to dim down,
Elara knew she must leave her small town.

Oh, Wandering Star, fly up to the blue!
With harps and tin whistles,

we'll see your light through.
A mystical journey, a hopeful design,

I'll leave my small footprint on a path so divine.
With steps full of courage, the mist I will break,

for this vital mission, my wish I will make.

A moth made of moonlight, a swift guiding friend,
gave a gentle signal right 'til the end.

"The Misty Woods wait, you 
must pass them with care,

where the Celtic music floats up in the air."
She crossed the soft river that sang a sweet tune,

built a small magic bridge beneath the pale moon.
Then climbed the great mountain,

the last rocky crest,
where the star lay in silence, needing a rest.

Oh, Wandering Star, fly up to the blue!
With harps and tin whistles,

we'll see your light through.
A mystical journey, a hopeful design,

I'll leave my small footprint on a path so divine.
With steps full of courage, the mist I will break,

for this vital mission, my wish I will make.

The star felt so cold, a shimmering tear,
Elara breathed deep and held it so near.

She sang a sweet melody, a wish from her heart,
a spark from her soul right from the start.

The gem shone again, a bright burning flair,
a silver thread rising up through the air.

Now the dark sky shines brighter than before,
the star lights the cosmos forevermore.

Elara returned, with stories untold,
the true kind of magic is more precious than gold.

name: The Adventures of Sun and Shadow
lyrics:
In a tiny sun-drenched town, where 
the sky was bright and clear,

Two peculiar kittens lived, they 
spent their afternoon right near.

One was Sun, with fur of gold, 
eyes of blue, like the endless air,

He chased the sparkling motes 
of dust, without a single care.

The other, Shadow, gray and 
calm, with eyes of olive green,

He dreamt of mysteries and 
rest, the quieter of the scene.

Upon an old rooftop they stayed, 
each with a different view of light,

But both were waiting for a secret, 
to make the day exciting and right.

Then a playful gust of wind 
arrived, a sudden flurry in the air,

It dropped an old and worn-out 
map, landing exactly there.

It showed a hidden treasure spot, 
in the village, lost and deep,

Sun jumped up with pure excitement, 
Shadow woke from his deep sleep.

“Come on, Shadow, adventure calls, 
the treasure we must find today!”

“Patience, Sun, the riddle is first, 
let’s see the path and find the way.”

They left the roof and all their 
games, ready to begin the stride,

Following the ancient lines, 
letting the map be their guide.

The first stop on the treasure hunt 
was the old Windmill, cool and grand.

Surrounded by a gentle breeze, 
a magical spot in the land.

Inside there was a riddle carved, 
a puzzle for their curious heads.

“Soft as a feather, but can make you 
sleep. What is it?” the riddle said.

Sun thought of clouds and fluffy things, 
his mind could not make sense of it,

But Shadow, calm and quick and sure, 
said: “My pillow, where I sit!”

Correct! The singing birds exclaimed, 
the pathway opened wide with speed,

And on they went upon their quest, 
planted like an ancient seed.

They rushed to Mrs. Flower’s garden, 
a rainbow on the fertile ground.

With happy, buzzing bees at 
work, making a cheerful sound.

The colorful life was smiling back, 
another clue came quick and fast.

The final hint then pointed to the 
"Great Tree of Knowledge," built to last.

They reached the mighty central 
tree, in the plaza, vast and old.

The birds were singing history, 
ancient tales of strength and gold.

Sun and Shadow looked at each 
other, the mission nearly through.

They realized the journey’s purpose, 
was not just finding something new.

They searched and searched the bark and 
roots, for any hidden sign or trace.

Sun digging with his little paws, 
Shadow watching the entire space.

The map then vanished in the air, the 
quest was finally done and sealed.

The treasure was not gold or gems, 
but a secret they had just revealed.

It was the friendship growing strong, 
just like that old and mighty tree,

And all the help they’d given 
out, to every person, happily.

Sun and Shadow, heroes of the town, 
no longer seeking mere wealth.

They found the greatest treasure: 
their friendship and good health.

name: The Echo of the Unicorn’s Steps
lyrics:
In a small quiet town by the 
snow-capped mountains tall,

Aelar the artist felt the silence of the wall.
Same days, same canvas, until the twilight came,

A mystic sound, an echo, whispered out his name.
Not a bounce from the stone, or a hollow reply,

But a magical calling beneath the open sky.
It grabbed his full attention, a curiosity pure,

To seek the sound's origin, 
the path they must secure.

Aelar called for Brillo, 
his friend true and bright,

A white unicorn, eyes serene as the dawn's light.

They set off to the wilds, 
leaving the village behind,

Where ancient secrets echo 
through the heart and mind.

Trees are whispering tales 
of the magic held so deep,

Following the sound that the spirits wish to keep.
Loyalty is their compass, courage lights the way,

To find the source of wonder 
at the close of the day.

Hear the echo, the echo, 
the echo of luminous feet!

A hymn of pure hope, a rhythm so sweet.
Brillo’s horn is the beacon, his mane is a star,

Protecting the magic, no matter how far.
Hear the echo, the echo, the echo, deep inside!

Where love and true friendship forever reside.

Mist and shadows, a creature stood in their way,
With a tricky riddle to halt their bright day:

"Day's traveler, my existence 
defies the sight. What am I?"

Aelar answered clearly: "Imagination's might."
The path opened wide, the shadows began to fade.

At the backward flowing river, 
the water spirit made a plea,

"Give me what grows without 
increasing its size for me."

Aelar gave a drawing, his 
brushstroke sincere and keen,

Showing inner growth, a beautiful scene.

At the clouded summit, the 
Guardian’s voice unbound,

"This pure-hearted calling, 
to protect the sacred ground."

Seeing their great courage and loyalty so true,
He granted them the power to keep the magic new.

The darkness confronted, not 
with weapons but with grace,

Aelar spoke of compassion,

healing that forgotten space.
Reconciliation won the day.

The echo rings eternal, a promise shining bright,
Aelar and Brillo, guarding day and night.

Painting destiny with friendship and with lore,
The echo of the unicorn steps forevermore.

name: The Kingdom of Luckoria and the Dice of Discord
lyrics:
In Luckoria, the digital domain,
Where RNG was king and used to reign.

Brave heroes, light sorceresses, so true,
A fantasy world beneath skies of blue.

All was chance, balanced and serene,
Until the dark Dice showed up on the scene.

Oh, Dice of Discord! The black side did fall,

Bringing bad fortune and ruin to all.
The crops withered, the missions would fail,

A jealous sorcerer behind the dark veil.
But Lia, Gorm, and Zephyr will stand and fight,

They’ll bring balance back 
with the crystals of light!

Lia, the sorceress, with light in her hand,
Gorm, the warrior, the strongest in the land.

Zephyr, the elf archer, with infallible aim,
Set out on a quest to defeat the cruel game.

Through enchanted forests and rivers of fire,
Their determination burning ever higher.

Oh, Dice of Discord! The black side did fall,

Bringing bad fortune and ruin to all.
The crops withered, the missions would fail,

A jealous sorcerer behind the dark veil.
But Lia, Gorm, and Zephyr will stand and fight,

They’ll bring balance back 
with the crystals of light!

They search for the Crystals of Fortune's might,
Five magic gems shining ever so bright.

Each guardian a challenge, a test of the soul,
Friendship and courage will make them whole.

One, two, three, four, five! The power is real,
Ascending the Tower of Destiny to seal.

The Dice is rolling, creating a storm,
Quakes and fire, the world is now warned.

With the pure crystal light, they trap it inside,
A prism of hope where the bad luck can hide.

Victory in Luckoria, the fortune is back,

Good and bad luck on the digital track.
The lesson we learned is forever the rule:

With friends and some courage, 
you'll never feel fooled!

name: The Radiant Ground and the Shells of Love
lyrics:
On a planet so distant, with forests so wide,
Lived Zilbo the Martian, nowhere to hide.

His skin changed with 
feelings, a green, gentle hue,

With a smile like a monster, 
but a heart kind and true.

His passion was simple, 
just collecting the shells,

He found flavors inside them, ringing magic bells.
He lived in the region called the Radiant Ground,

A glowing bright floor where 
true love could be found.

Oh, the Radiant Ground! The light faded fast,

The magic of love, a shadow of the past.
The Martian spirit turned selfish and cold,

A story of darkness that had to unfold.
But Zilbo the tiny, he knew what to do,

To bring back the bright 
glow, to make love feel new.

He took his nut shells, his energy fuel,

And started his journey, defying the cruel
Challenges waiting, the rivers and the snow,

His hope and his pure heart continued to glow.
The secret he found was no curse or dark spell,

Just the lack of true 
gratitude where Martians dwell.

A selfless pure action was the key to restart,
To fill every person with love in their heart.

He returned to his home, 
with a clear, honest sight,

To perform the great act 
that would summon the light.

His cherished nut shells, his most precious prize,
He shared them with everyone,

before all their eyes.
A simple devotion, a spark caught the air,

The love that was sleeping began to repair.
The cosmic synth bass is ready to pump!

And suddenly, shining, the radiance came back,

The ground glowed with magic, 
right there on the track.

But the twist was the sweetest, 
the truth he then knew:

The shells held light seeds, 
that he spread as he flew.

By eating and sharing, the magic was freed,
The love was recovered by a tiny green deed.

Zilbo, the small hero, with love as his might,
Saved the whole planet by spreading his light.

Now when you walk here, you 
feel love deep and sound,

Because of Zilbo and the shells he unbound.

A Martian so tiny, a spirit so grand,
He made the ground sparkle across the whole land.

name: The Valley of the Golden Fireflies
lyrics:
Beneath the starry drape, when 
the full moon glows so bright,

A hidden valley rests, guarding ancient light.
Young Liam, from a quiet, sleeping town,

Felt the wild calling, where 
adventure can be found.

With eyes of clear water, 
and hair like darkest night,

He sought the secret deep, 
following the moon's white light.

Oh, Valley of the Golden Fireflies!
Where fallen flowers shine like stars up high.

Oh, ancient magic, reaching for the skies!
The air is dancing with a golden cry.

A path was shown, a shimmering trail of grace,
Leading the young boy to this sacred place.

He reached the stone circle, silent and so old,
Saw the wooden scepter, a story to unfold.

He touched the staff and histories unfurled,
Of a wizard ancient, who saved their world.

He protected the people, 
with wisdom and with might,

The simple wooden scepter, 
his tool of fading light.

But then the silence broke, 
a dangerous, cold sound,

Dark shadowy creatures rose 
from the forest ground.

They came to steal the light, 
to bring eternal night,

To quench the golden fireflies 
with all their fading might.

Liam felt the destiny, his purpose loud and clear:
"I will be the guardian, conquering all fear!"

Oh, Valley of the Golden Fireflies!
Where fallen flowers shine like stars up high.

Oh, ancient magic, reaching for the skies!
The air is dancing with a golden cry.

With staff in hand and a 
heart that was brave and true,

The golden light pushed back the darkness through.

A wave of pure magic, a mantle of pure gold,
The shadows vanished, the dark was now controlled.

The valley is safe now, peace has returned.
Liam, the silent keeper, his lesson learned.

And beneath the moonlight, 
he watches over his home,

For bravery's light will 
shine, wherever he may roam.

name: The Unicorn with the Removable Horn
lyrics:
In a hidden valley where 
the sunlight feared to land

Lived a lonely unicorn, 
with a horn held in his hand

It wasn't crystal bright, 
nor a beacon from the sky

It was detachable, a secret he must hide and deny
He would shed it nightly beneath the somber stars

Fearing to be rejected, confined by lonely bars
His silent footsteps echoed,

his gaze was full of plight
A pure heart dwelling always in the eternal night

Oh, the horn is gone, the echo of the dread!
The unicorn cries out, his inner light is fled

The darkest shadow creature, 
stole his essential power

But the courage of his 
spirit blossomed in that hour

He searches in the darkness 
for a pathway to the light

His strength is not outside 
him, but in the will to fight

A cold and chilling whisper, a cruel and icy foe
Stole his very essence, where did his magic go?

Vulnerable and stripped bare, 
without his former grace

He had to face the truth and 
start to leave that place

Through shadowy dark pathways, 
where forgotten names reside

Hope was slowly fading with nowhere left to hide

But in the deepest night, rejection met its end
Other lost and marginalized souls became

his friend

Different and unique, their bond became so strong
Learning true acceptance is where they all belong

At the forgotten castle, the final duel they faced
Not for worldly power, but for the truth embraced

Oh, the horn is gone, the echo of the dread!
The unicorn cries out, his inner light is fled

The darkest shadow creature, 
stole his essential power

But the courage of his 
spirit blossomed in that hour

He searches in the darkness 
for a pathway to the light

His strength is not outside 
him, but in the will to fight

He recovered his horn, but it was not the same
For his valiant heart was

the strength that overcame
The valley of the shadows was lit by shining truth

True magic is acceptance, 
from childhood to old youth.

name: The Secret of the Crimson Bottle
lyrics:
In the quiet family home, where 
the garden grew so bright,

Lived a girl named Zara, 
full of curiosity and might.

No siblings to join her quest, 
but her mind was wide and free,

The Gomez house was her 
landscape, for exploration glee.

Every corner held a tale, every shadow a clue,

She turned the mundane into 
a mission, brave and new.

One day in the bathroom, on 
a shelf where dust resided,

She found an ancient bottle, 
where secrets were confided.

Crimson glass, a deep red, 
like a ruby old and grand,

She reached up to inspect it, 
with a clumsy little hand.

"What forgotten scent is this?" 
she thought with great delight,

Then her fingers slipped right 
off, giving way to tragic plight.

Smash! The crimson bottle fell, 
the glass went everywhere,

An ancient pungent cloud, 
spread quickly through the air.

Oh, what a persistent scent! 
A stench that would not cease!

The bottle’s hidden secret 
shattered all the peace.

Windows open wide! Fans 
spinning! It was all in vain!

That lingering, awful fragrance 
was driving them insane!

Mom and Dad were stressed 
out, the air was hard to face,

Zara knew it was her fault, 
she'd wreck the family space.

She remembered Grandmother, 
with her wisdom clear and plain:

A bad smell is defeated by a clever, fresh domain.
She declared: "I'll be the chemist!

I will find the proper key!"
A self-appointed mission, full of energy.

The kitchen is the laboratory, 
the stove is my big tool!

Herbs and spices, oh so many, following no rule.

She tried some pepper, 
cloves, and vinegar so sour,

But the crimson bottle’s scent 
held on with all its power!

After many crazy mixes, 
the solution came in sight,

A golden combination, shining oh so bright!
Lavender, fresh lemon zest, and garden-grown mint,

A natural neutralizing 
blend, without a single hint

Of that old and awful perfume; 
the bad air disappeared,

The home was fresh and happy, 
and the family cheered!

Smash! The crimson bottle fell, 
the glass went everywhere,

But the determined young 
girl conquered the foul air.

With lavender, lemon, mint, 
she showed them how to be,

A broken bottle only means 
a chance to grow and see.

And the Gomez house breathed 
fresh air, harmony was deep,

The crimson secret is the lesson that you keep!

name: The Weaver’s Tapestry
lyrics:
In a small village, with fields and the sun,
Lived Amalia, whose weaving was never done.

Her house so vibrant, painted in hue,
Where thread and needle created something new.

No simple fabrics, oh, she was much more,
In every warp, she wove dreams to adore.

Stories, and wishes, that a soul would confess,
Amalia the mage, with sweet masterful finesse.

Oh, the Weaver's Tapestry,
A canvas where time flows free.

Silk mountains high, rivers of bright glass,
The future's own magic that forever will last.

Follow the thread, follow the 
thread, never fear the sight,

For the golden hope path will 
guide you through the night.

One evening, came Clara, with honey-filled eyes,

She asked to see her future 
beneath the twilight skies.

"Weave, Amalia, a future I can understand,
For my hidden path I want to find in this land."

The weaver just smiled, accepting the plight,
She chose hues for the sky just before dark night.

Threads that kept shifting, dancing with grace,
The tapestry woke up, filling the space.

Suddenly, the pictures 
shifted, a view cold and stark,

A gloomy forest, swallowed by the dark.
A solitary tower, shrouded in black mist,

A warning in the fabric, a truth that persisted.
Amalia felt sadness, but Clara stood tall,

"How do I face this?", she 
asked, standing overall.

Inspired by the girl, her spirit so keen,

Amalia added a detail, a subtle, bright scene.
She took strands of gold, that shone without end,

Wove a pathway that starts 
from the garden, my friend,

Winding through the shadows, 
reaching the high keep,

A symbol of the light that 
wakes you from your sleep.

Days and nights sped by, the great work was done,
The map of the soul, beneath the rising sun.

"Your future is changing, 
like the thread that you see,

But the golden thread, follow it faithfully.
Courage and hope, your compass they will be."

Clara left with joy, knowing victory.

And Amalia kept weaving in 
her house of bright beams.

name: Thunderous Impact
lyrics:
In Nubelia, a sky-kingdom, a realm full of grace,

Where the clouds dance so 
softly, in a magical place.

One night, the full moon was shining so bright,
A colorful meteor pierced through the night.

Thunderous Impact! A splash of light so grand,
A cosmic gift of magic from a distant land.

Leo, the brave boy, felt the calling start,
A great new adventure for his faithful heart.

He packed up his compass, his map and his light,
And dear Mr. Bear held him tightly that night.

He went through the forest, the shadows so deep,
To find the great secret the heavens did keep.

Thunderous Impact! A splash of light so grand,
A cosmic gift of magic from a distant land.

Leo, the brave boy, felt the calling start,
A great new adventure for his faithful heart.

In the valley of crystals, 
where the glow was so clear,

The bright fragment whispered, removing all fear.

Now he talks to the flowers 
and understands beasts,

Bringing harmony and wonder 
to feasts (of the mind).

He came back to his home, with magic to share,

Forever protecting the life everywhere.
Nubelia remembers, beneath the starlight,

The night that the heavens 
brought hope and new light.

name: Light and Shadow in the Garden of Silences
lyrics:
The Garden of Silences, cold stone, silent ground
Only whispers of the old trees are found

Little Lume, a firefly, tiny, bright spark
Dancing alone, pushing back the dark

Tired of the twilight, weary of the shade
Seeking a purpose, a future to be made

The legend reached her, a voice in the gloom
The Midnight Flower, escaping silent doom

She flew through the darkness, following the star
Gotta know the answer, who and what we are

Found the black petals, the emerald eye's stare
Trembling, she asked it, breathing chilling air

I'm the light and the 
shadow, a single perfect fire

The darkness is the fuel 
that takes the flame higher

Don't run from the void, embrace the chilling cost
True power is balance, nothing is ever lost

The brightest revelation, when two worlds collide
Light cannot stand tall if shadow doesn't ride

This is the rebirth, the anthem in the night
You are the garden, you are the final light!

The ancient flower spoke, a deep resonant sound
"Your gift is the brilliance

on this lonely ground"
"But every firefly draws the consuming night"

"You must face the darkness 
to claim your final right!"

It wilted and descended, a glowing green seed fell
Lume touched the magic, breaking the silent spell

Out stepped her mirror, a sister twin in gray
The shadow companion, here to light the way

I'm the light and the 
shadow, a single perfect fire

The darkness is the fuel 
that takes the flame higher

Don't run from the void, embrace the chilling cost
True power is balance, nothing is ever lost

The brightest revelation, when two worlds collide
Light cannot stand tall if shadow doesn't ride

This is the rebirth, the anthem in the night
You are the garden, you are the final light!

The garden is shaking, the whispers turn to song
The gloom is dissolving where it stood for so long

Guardians united, with a purpose crystal clear
Transforming the silence, conquering every fear

A sanctuary rising, where opposites take hold
A story of the future, brave, brilliant, and bold

Light and shadow dancing, the rhythm of the soul!

I'm the light and the 
shadow, a single perfect fire

The darkness is the fuel 
that takes the flame higher

Don't run from the void, embrace the chilling cost
True power is balance, nothing is ever lost

The brightest revelation, when two worlds collide
Light cannot stand tall if shadow doesn't ride

This is the rebirth, the anthem in the night
You are the garden, you are the final light!

Eternally playing, a beacon in the sky
In balance, we live, where shadows meet the high

The true essence of life, we rise, we stand tall
Lume and her sister, welcoming them all.

name: Flamerina: The Brave Water Drop
lyrics:
In the high peaks, where the clouds collide
A lonely droplet, nowhere to hide

Flamerina’s heart, a secret she keeps
Water and lava, running deep

No normal mist, no typical flow
A fiery courage ready to grow!

The mountains cracked, the earth gave a sigh
The sun beat down from a pitiless sky

She watched the world, withered and dust
Trapped by the fear, defined by distrust

But a fierce whisper in her liquid soul
Said: The drought is yours to control!

Shatter the glass, break the barrier wall
Answer the planet’s desperate call.

FLAMERINA! DROP THE BASS, BRING THE RAIN!
FIRE AND WATER, BREAK THE CHAIN!

FLAMERINA! UNIQUE IS THE KEY!
A CATALYST OF LIFE, WILD AND FREE!

THE VAPOR RISES, THE TEMPEST STRIKES
HER LAVA CORE IS WHERE TRUE POWER LIKES!

A RUSH OF COURAGE, A THUNDER SOUND
THE BRAVEST WATER DROP ON SOLID GROUND!

She felt the fear, the draining retreat
Each drop she gave, tasted bittersweet

Her selfless storm, a shimmering blast
Making the present stronger than the past

The desert drank, the green came alive
Watch the whole forest instantly thrive

The cycle spins, the redemption is done
Her destiny started, her battle won.

FLAMERINA! DROP THE BASS, BRING THE RAIN!
FIRE AND WATER, BREAK THE CHAIN!

FLAMERINA! UNIQUE IS THE KEY!
A CATALYST OF LIFE, WILD AND FREE!

THE VAPOR RISES, THE TEMPEST STRIKES
HER LAVA CORE IS WHERE TRUE POWER LIKES!

A RUSH OF COURAGE, A THUNDER SOUND
THE BRAVEST WATER DROP ON SOLID GROUND!

Then came the Dragon, Volcanix strong and bold
Taught her the magic, a story untold

Acuarel the Nymph, wisdom serene
Showed her the balance, clean and pristine

No more sacrifice, no more running low
Just centered power, ready to flow!

Master the merge, the elemental groove
Fire and water, nothing left to prove.

FLAMERINA! DROP THE BASS, BRING THE RAIN!
FIRE AND WATER, BREAK THE CHAIN!

FLAMERINA! UNIQUE IS THE KEY!
A CATALYST OF LIFE, WILD AND FREE!

THE VAPOR RISES, THE TEMPEST STRIKES
HER LAVA CORE IS WHERE TRUE POWER LIKES!

A RUSH OF COURAGE, A THUNDER SOUND
THE BRAVEST WATER DROP ON SOLID GROUND!

The storm is over, the fear is gone!
She found her purpose from dusk 'til dawn!

Water and fire, perfectly aligned
The power of self, forever defined!

name: The Mystery of Quantum Island
lyrics:
The wave crashed hard, forget the maps! 
This secret shoreline throws you into traps.

A strange light pulled me, I lost my mind, 
I dropped all my memories, what did I find?

Colors are changing, they shift in the breeze, 
the Professor Quantum will put you at ease.

His presence is shining, a powerful stream: 
the physics you know is just a past dream.

The first lesson's here: what is light in the 
air? A gentle *wave* or a *particle* flare?

It all just depends on the glance that you 
choose, a double enigma, nothing to lose!

Walk on the island, the truth will all slide, 
firm certainties here have nowhere to hide.

The laws of your world must be tossed to the 
sea—what you watch too closely will flee!

QUANTUM, QUANTUM! The island of great knowledge.
MYSTERY IN THE AIR! Let your mind take college.

If you try to measure with a gaze so 
tight and clear, the thing that you

study just will disappear!
There's a rhythm so strong,

a vibrant, vital sound,
The universe is yours on this quantum ground!

Nox the guardian, he whispered the 
key: *Uncertainty* is the only decree!

Look in the mirror, the image is blurred, 
chasing down answers is highly absurd.

The Labyrinth proves *non-locality*, what 
happens right here affects all eternity!

The universe whole is connected, it’s true, 
even when the stars seem so far from you.

QUANTUM, QUANTUM! The island of great knowledge.
MYSTERY IN THE AIR! Let your mind take college.

If you try to measure with a gaze so 
tight and clear, the thing that you

study just will disappear!
There's a rhythm so strong,

a vibrant, vital sound,
The universe is yours on this quantum ground!

The Great Collider screams, 
a *Big Bang* of bright force.

Observe the beginning, the cosmos' first source.
In the chaos and changes,

the final delight—there's order 
in shadow, there's magic in light.

Connected to everything, no need to define,
The truth is too massive, the feeling divine.

QUANTUM, QUANTUM! The island of great knowledge.
MYSTERY IN THE AIR! Let your mind take college.

If you try to measure with a gaze so 
tight and clear, the thing that you

study just will disappear!
There's a rhythm so strong,

a vibrant, vital sound,
The universe is yours on this quantum ground!

I woke up back home, but the knowing remains,
The wonder of science runs through my own veins.

I carry the secret of the sphere that is bright,
The question is the key to the ultimate light!

His presence is shining, a powerful stream: 
the physics you know is just a past dream.

The first lesson's here: what is light in the 
air? A gentle *wave* or a *particle* flare?

It all just depends on the glance that you 
choose, a double enigma, nothing to lose!

Walk on the island, the truth will all slide, 
firm certainties here have nowhere to hide.

The laws of your world must be tossed to the 
sea—what you watch too closely will flee!

QUANTUM, QUANTUM! The island of great knowledge.
MYSTERY IN THE AIR! Let your mind take college.

If you try to measure with a gaze so 
tight and clear, the thing that you

study just will disappear!
There's a rhythm so strong,

a vibrant, vital sound,
The universe is yours on this quantum ground!

Nox the guardian, he whispered the 
key: *Uncertainty* is the only decree!

Look in the mirror, the image is blurred, 
chasing down answers is highly absurd.

The Labyrinth proves *non-locality*, what 
happens right here affects all eternity!

The universe whole is connected, it’s true, 
even when the stars seem so far from you.

QUANTUM, QUANTUM! The island of great knowledge.
MYSTERY IN THE AIR! Let your mind take college.

If you try to measure with a gaze so 
tight and clear, the thing that you

study just will disappear!
There's a rhythm so strong,

a vibrant, vital sound,
The universe is yours on this quantum ground!

The Great Collider screams, 
a *Big Bang* of bright force.

Observe the beginning, the cosmos' first source.
In the chaos and changes,

the final delight—there's order 
in shadow, there's magic in light.

Connected to everything, no need to define,
The truth is too massive, the feeling divine.

QUANTUM, QUANTUM! The island of great knowledge.
MYSTERY IN THE AIR! Let your mind take college.

If you try to measure with a gaze so 
tight and clear, the thing that you

study just will disappear!
There's a rhythm so strong,

a vibrant, vital sound,
The universe is yours on this quantum ground!

I woke up back home, but the knowing remains,
The wonder of science runs through my own veins.

I carry the secret of the sphere that is bright,
The question is the key to the ultimate light!

name: Luna and the Mystery of the Spectral Galaxy
lyrics:
Stardust whispers, a physics call

From the attic floor to the galaxy wall.
Luna, the seeker, driven by the facts

Exploring the cosmos, 
tracking the spectral tracks.

Ancient star chart, more than a legend's gleam
It marks the coordinates for a spectral dream.

Orion the inventor, with gears and complex wiring
Built the 'Shooting Star,' a vessel for aspiring.

We travel through spacetime, bending the light
Navigating nebulae, sharp and pure insight.

Understanding wormholes, a 
shortcut through the void

The laws of physics, brilliantly employed.

Spectral Galaxy, a mosaic of light's speed!
The Cosmic Crystal's energy—a fundamental need.

Its wavelength is failing, the balance is lost

We need the resonance, whatever the cost!
Luna, the pendant, the spiral's true design

A fractal pattern where cosmic energies align!
Science in your hands, the power to compute

Find the right frequency, 
bear the celestial fruit!

We observe the black holes, 
their immense gravity field

Secrets of the core, finally revealed.

The star creation cycle, a process we must check
From stellar nurseries to a cosmic wreck.

The Crystal's composition, an unstable element
Its spectral signature, rapidly is spent.

We analyze the data, with precision and grace
To stabilize the matter, saving time and space.

The pendant's spiral, a perfect logarithmic curve
It matches the Crystal's energy, ready to serve!

Resonance frequency, the key to the solution
I'll merge the two powers, completing the fusion.

A burst of pure light, energy is conserved
The Spectral Galaxy's fate is now preserved!

The laws of the universe, powerful and true
A simple reaction, making everything new.

Spectral Galaxy, a mosaic of light's speed!

The Cosmic Crystal's energy—a fundamental need.
Its wavelength is failing, the balance is lost

We need the resonance, whatever the cost!
Luna, the pendant, the spiral's true design

A fractal pattern where cosmic energies align!
Science in your hands, the power to compute

Find the right frequency, 
bear the celestial fruit!

Mission completed, the data is stored and clear
Understanding physics conquers all the fear.

Luna, the scientist, charting the future's zone
Knowledge is power, from the earth to the unknown.
