name: Milo's Magical Kebab
lyrics:
City hummin', belly drummin' loud
Searchin' high, above the crowd

Then I smelled it, spice in the air
A tiny stand, a magical snare

Rhythm is rising, the beat is strong
Gotta move fast, where do I belong?

Old man's eyes, a wise old gleam
Said, "Young adventurer, what's your dream?"

I want the best, the flavor supreme!
Missed the small sign, living in a dream

Vegan peanuts, a crunchy surprise
But the taste hit me right between the eyes!

A sweet mistake, an exceptional bite
Shinin' bright, pure delight!

No looking back now, the moment is here
Washing away every single fear

This ain't just food, this is fire in the soul!
Magic Kebab, taking full control!

A simple bite, changed the path I trod
Found the real joy, sent straight from God!

Savor the moment, let the flavor unfold!
A simple story, now forever told!

Yeah, forever told! Taste the wonder!
Break the mold! Hear the thunder!

The old man whispered, a secret decree
"Finish the feast, and a wish comes free!"

No more riches, no silver or gold
Just joy in the hunger, brave and bold!

I wished for happiness, in every small taste
No simple meal would ever be waste!

From common bread to the grandest stew
The magic is real, the feeling is new!

Walk the pavement, feel the change inside
Nowhere left to run, nowhere left to hide!

This ain't just food, this is fire in the soul!
Magic Kebab, taking full control!

A simple bite, changed the path I trod
Found the real joy, sent straight from God!

Savor the moment, let the flavor unfold!
A simple story, now forever told!

Yeah, forever told! Taste the wonder!
Break the mold! Hear the thunder!

The air flashed bright, a sudden warm glow
Happiness granted, watch the feeling grow!

Unexpected twist, the power is mine
In simple surprises, the true blessings shine!

Peanuts and spice, the ultimate key
Every single moment is savory!

Gotta feel the rhythm, gotta feel the heat
This magical flavor cannot be beat!

This ain't just food, this is fire in the soul!
Magic Kebab, taking full control!

A simple bite, changed the path I trod
Found the real joy, sent straight from God!

Savor the moment, let the flavor unfold!
A simple story, now forever told!

Yeah, forever told! Taste the wonder!
Break the mold! Hear the thunder!

Milo's journey, just begun!
Savor the world, 'til the settin' sun!

Kebab magic, yeah!
Never forget that peanut flavor!

Joy in every single taste! Feel the groove!
Yeah! The joy is here! (Fade out)

name: The Rite of the Arcane
lyrics:
Valdeluz sleeps, where the wild wood breathes
Ancient whispers carried on the breeze

Young Elio woke, heart pounding fast and bold
Destiny calling, a tale to unfold

In the dirt and the petals, a glint of pure gold
The Amulet of Aradia, a secret untold

Grandmother Ada's eyes saw the shift in the light

A map on the wall, shining bright in the night
Arcane path waiting, no fear in his stride

Through the whispering dark 
where the wild creatures hide

This is the Rite of the Arcane, a power you earn
Face the deep shadows, the lesson you learn

Not metal or magic, not star-written lore
But the bond in your soul is the

knowledge you store

Break the old limits, shatter the chain
The purest connection washes over the pain

Stone circle glowing, mystic symbols in sight
Under the spiral of cosmic, swirling light

The ancient voice boomed, demanded the toll
What is most valuable to your searching soul?

He stood at the altar, the final decree
Seeking true wisdom, forever to be free

This is the Rite of the Arcane, a power you earn
Face the deep shadows, the lesson you learn

Not metal or magic, not star-written lore
But the bond in your soul is the

knowledge you store

Break the old limits, shatter the chain
The purest connection washes over the pain

He thought of the laughter, the gentle hand held
The love from his Ada, a force unexcelled

Tears hit the stone, a sacrifice pure
A cosmic transaction, a light to endure

Love is the currency, magic is the flow
The greatest power the universe could show

This is the Rite of the Arcane, a power you earn

Face the deep shadows, the lesson you learn
Not metal or magic, not star-written lore

But the bond in your soul 
is the knowledge you store

Break the old limits, shatter the chain
The purest connection washes over the pain

The light fades slow, Elio stands tall
He answered the question, he mastered it all

The arcane wisdom, now running within
The true magic story will now begin

name: The Magical Mobile Phone and the Game Monsters
lyrics:
Screenland spinning, bright and bold
Pixel shining, stories told

But the colors start to drain
A shadow falls, a digital rain

System crash, the light is dim
Something wicked lurking in!

Meet the crew, the Game Monster pack
No turning down, there’s no turning back

Red wings beat, a hurricane blow
Blue arms weave a tentacle glow

Yellow spots are bursting bright
We see the virus, stealing the light

Gray clouds creeping on the border line
Need to fix the magic, make the whole world shine

The games are frozen, music’s stuck on mute

Time to hunt the darkness, 
pull it out by the root!

Pixel Power! Hear the call!
Standing tall, we won't fall!

Every single part we play
Chasing the shadows far away

Unite the colors, break the code
Lift the burden, shift the load

We are small but we are mighty, hear the thunder!
Teamwork tears the viral walls asunder!

Through the Forest of Photos, 
where the frames are gold

A thousand memories, a sight to behold
Across the River of Melodies, notes fly like fish

We move with the rhythm, granting every wish
Over Mountains of Messages,

the words paved the way
No hesitation, we will seize the day

The dark code is pulsing, it's deep in the heart
We gotta hit it hard right from the start!

Red monster blows the clouds with powerful might
Blue monster locks the trap, holding it tight!

Pixel Power! Hear the call!
Standing tall, we won't fall!

Every single part we play
Chasing the shadows far away

Unite the colors, break the code
Lift the burden, shift the load

We are small but we are mighty, hear the thunder!
Teamwork tears the viral walls asunder!

They thought we were just small pixels on a screen
But look at the fight, the wildest ever seen

No matter your size, no matter 
your form, no matter your hue

You got a magic inside, and you know what to do
Our difference is the strength,

our colors blend in one
Together we finish what the darkness had begun!

One final burst of light, a star-spot gleam
Smashing the black shadow, fulfilling the dream!

Pixel Power! Hear the call!
Standing tall, we won't fall!

Every single part we play
Chasing the shadows far away

Unite the colors, break the code
Lift the burden, shift the load

We are small but we are mighty, hear the thunder!
Teamwork tears the viral walls asunder!

The screen is brighter now, 
the magic's flowing free

Games are back on track, for the world to see
Pixel glows! The victory is sweet!

The Game Monsters, can't be beat!
Yeah! The light is back!

name: The Forgotten Kingdom: Adventures Under the Couch
lyrics:
Yeah, turn the volume up!
Secrets hide in plain sight,

where the light can't hit
Beneath the velvet, down the dust abyss

Forget the surface, forget the sound
The biggest kingdom is underground!

Luz on the carpet, Rayo is gone
A fast car vanished just before the dawn

Chasing a rubber ball, swallowed by the deep
The couch is calling, secrets it keeps.

Plastic sword ready, heart beating fire,
Used the old spell, reaching for higher.

Flash! I am tiny, the world expands wide,
A desert of fabric, nowhere left to hide.

Now I'm crossing the border, the unseen line,
Ready to battle, the forgotten mine!

Forgotten Kingdom! Dust bunny mountains rise!
Where lonely socks dream and the old watch dies.

Shadow Guardians creep, they watch every move,
But courage is massive, we got something to prove.

Couch-side adventure, the crumbs are our gold,
This epic's unspoken, a story untold!

We break the silence, we fight the dark air,
Freedom is waiting, just beyond despair!

Met Centi the fire, a forgotten bright spark,

Burning the fear out, lighting up the dark.
Valleys of cookie-dust, rivers of grey,

We weave through the darkness, finding a way.
The whispers are chilling, the shadows are fast,

Traps in the fibers, built to always last.
But we push harder, driven by the friend,

The journey won't stop until the very end.
To the Palace of the Forgotten,

walls built from old toys,
Hearing the echoes of long-lost joys.

Forgotten Kingdom! Dust bunny mountains rise!
Where lonely socks dream and the old watch dies.

Shadow Guardians creep, they watch every move,
But courage is massive, we got something to prove.

Couch-side adventure, the crumbs are our gold,
This epic's unspoken, a story untold!

We break the silence, we fight the dark air,
Freedom is waiting, just beyond despair!

The King is a timepiece, stuck in the past,
Tells us the secret, a portal built to last!

Shadows attack now, the final, sharp sting,
Luz and Centi fighting, the bells start to ring.

Then Rayo rolls in, leading the found,
We seize the moment, no longer earthbound!

One mighty charge! The darkness is done,
Jumping the portal, before the sun!

Forgotten Kingdom! Dust bunny mountains rise!
Where lonely socks dream and the old watch dies.

Shadow Guardians creep, they watch every move,
But courage is massive, we got something to prove.

Couch-side adventure, the crumbs are our gold,
This epic's unspoken, a story untold!

We break the silence, we fight the dark air,
Freedom is waiting, just beyond despair!

We're back on the surface, the story is true,
Luz smiles and knows there's a world

waiting for you.
Under the couch, man,

that's where the heart is,
The forgotten Kingdom,

where the real party starts.
Yeah. Real party starts.

name: The Key of Time
lyrics:
In the village of Dawn where 
the moon and sun collide

An ancient secret sleeps, where the shadows hide
Under the root-bound cedar,

a mystery waits for touch
A curious girl named Lía, wanting way too much.

She unearthed the wooden chest, 
adorned with glyphs of old

A spectral light erupted, a story to unfold
The Key of Time was humming,

a pulse within her palm
She risked the elders' warning

for an electric, sudden calm
One reckless turn in the air,

a flash of pure white light
She ripped the canvas open,

and stepped beyond the night.
Hello, ancestral faces, a Dawn she did not know

A hundred years retreated, 
a fast and frantic flow.

The Key of Time! It’s heavy 
metal, spinning fast and free!

Don’t chase the phantom future 
or the ghosts of history!

(Tick-Tock) Every second is a 
diamond, you cannot rewind the track

(Boom-Clack) You held the power in 
your hands, but could you ever go back?

Oh, the Key of Time! It beats the 
rhythm, fast and sharp and true!

The only moment that is real 
is standing right with you!

She played the game too 
boldly, another fateful spin

Now lost in eras ancient, where 
the wild world rushed right in

No gentle village faces, 
just survival's urgent strain

She sought the key's true essence 
through the sunshine and the rain.

It’s not the lock you open, 
it’s the love inside your core

A key that turns on feelings, 
that unlocks so much more.

She focused on the memory 
of family, warmth, and grace

A longing for the present, 
a return to her own space.

The Key of Time! It’s heavy 
metal, spinning fast and free!

Don’t chase the phantom future 
or the ghosts of history!

(Tick-Tock) Every second is a 
diamond, you cannot rewind the track

(Boom-Clack) You held the power in 
your hands, but could you ever go back?

Oh, the Key of Time! It beats the

name: The Lost Song
lyrics:
Harmony village, the rhythm runs deep
But Lía’s mind, a secret it keeps.

Tried to catch notes, they just slipped away fast,
A silent soul where the music won’t last.

One night a whisper, a sound from the void,

A universe melody, truly employed.
Complex and cosmic, a heart-shaking sound,

Next dawn, it was gone, nowhere to be found!
A deep empty ache, a persistent low hum,

Said, "This is the quest, 
'til the music has come."

Headed to the Tree, where the legends are old,
Where the secrets of cosmos are bravely told.

Lost Song! It’s vibrating deep in my core!
Lost Song! Gotta break down every door!

Through the forest dark, the shadows ignite,
Riddles and rhythm, I’m fighting the night!

It’s not in the mind, it lives in the soul,
Gotta earn the music, gotta make myself whole!

Dancing with fairies, a flute in the air,
Dodging the spirits that lure you to care.

Every step forward, a piece I regain,
Wash off the doubt, wash away the sharp pain.

Found the Great Tree, roots deep in the stone,
A majestic conductor on a silent throne.

Closed my eyes tight, let the feeling take hold,
A memory of magic, worth more than pure gold.

The branches bow down, the forest sings loud,
Shattering the silence, breaking the cloud!

The melody surged, pure, cosmic, and clear,
Banishing every doubt, conquering fear.

The flute is the gift, carved deep from the wood,
Now the instrument listens, finally understood!

Lost Song! It’s vibrating deep in my core!
Lost Song! Gotta break down every door!

Through the forest dark, the shadows ignite,
Riddles and rhythm, I’m fighting the night!

It’s not in the mind, it lives in the soul,
Gotta earn the music, gotta make myself whole!

Back to Harmony, the music is free.
The true song found, for all eyes to see.

From the heart to the air, forever it rings,
The language of the cosmos,

the joy that it brings.
Listen close now! The Lost Song is here!

name: The Light That Fades
lyrics:
Shadows creeping, silence deep and cold
The Great Lamp flickers, stories left untold.

Brightvale waits, swallowed by the night,
The magic's dying, we need a burst of light!

Fear hit the village, a tangible, heavy chain,

But Elara stood up, washing out the pain.
Wise Milo spoke of the Summit's icy peak,

Lunar Stone waits, for the fearless and the meek.
Ancient medallion glows faint upon her chest,

She packed her purpose, put courage to the test.
With Liro the Dragon,

and Tara the Lynx by her side,
A path of peril where only heroes ride.

Gotta chase the dark back, 
gotta break the heavy gray,

The Light That Fades will shine again today!
Climbing up the mountain, wind is in my soul,

Lunar Stone mission, gotta make the village whole!
We are the fire that water cannot drown!

We are the spirit that wears the champion's crown!

Cross the River of Dreams 
where sleep can hold you fast,

Whispers try to fool you, pulling down the past.
Goblins tried to snatch the light right

from her hand,
But friendship

held the line, across the rugged land.
Each step is harder, snow is thick and deep,

A promise made is a promise we must keep.
The Summit calls us, defying every law,

Facing the Guardian, standing tall in awe.

Gotta chase the dark back, 
gotta break the heavy gray,

The Light That Fades will shine again today!
Climbing up the mountain, wind is in my soul,

Lunar Stone mission, gotta make the village whole!

We are the fire that water cannot drown!
We are the spirit that wears the champion's crown!

Guardian's riddle, sharper than the ice,
He demands the wisdom, paying freedom's price.

I grow, need the air, but water kills my might,
Elara closed her eyes and saw the inner light.

The answer is the FIRE that 
burns inside the brave,

The wisdom that will conquer every grave!
She held the crystal high, the victory is sealed,

The power of pure knowledge, finally revealed!

Gotta chase the dark back, 
gotta break the heavy gray,

The Light That Fades will shine again today!
Climbing up the mountain, wind is in my soul,

Lunar Stone mission, gotta make the village whole!

We are the fire that water cannot drown!
We are the spirit that wears the champion's crown!

Back to Brightvale, the twilight is undone,
The battle's over, the victory is won!

The lamp is shining, a beacon through the haze,
Elara's legend echoes through the days!

The Light That Fades!
It shines forever!

name: Flap Flap
lyrics:
Alasol town glows, where the sky is ablaze
Painted with courage in a thousand new ways

Annual wishes, paper butterflies ride
Folding up futures, they take to the tide!

Wishes ascend, then suddenly crash
Hope took a dive in a lightning quick flash

Panic is spreading, a shadow descends
When the magic is stolen, where the journey ends?

Leo and Mia, they stepped up to the fight
Chasing the answers through the dark fading light

Scanning the fields and the deep forest floor
Gotta break this mystery, gotta find the core.

Follow the flutter, hear the rhythm, the beat
Flap Flap is the secret, guiding our feet

Chasing the magic where the dreams never fade
Flap Flap is the hero, in the dark and the shade!

Follow the sound, trust the voice in the air
Hope is protected, we just gotta care!

Deep in the shadows, a crystalline gleam
A cave full of wishes, like a powerful dream

An ancient protector, with wings wide and bright
Guarding the paper from the darkest of night

The evil wind whispers, tries to tear them apart

But a wish is a fortress, 
built right in the heart!

She waits for the calm, for the stars to align
To send out the promise, a message divine!

Follow the flutter, hear the rhythm, the beat
Flap Flap is the secret, guiding our feet

Chasing the magic where the dreams never fade
Flap Flap is the hero, in the dark and the shade!

Follow the sound, trust the voice in the air
Hope is protected, we just gotta care!

Don't fear the shadows, don't fear the retreat
The wishes were safe, now the victory is sweet!

Leo and Mia, they restored the belief
In the power of flying, beyond all the grief!

Higher than ever, they soared to the black
Now the spirit of Alasol is finally back!

Follow the flutter, hear the rhythm, the beat
Flap Flap is the secret, guiding our feet

Chasing the magic where the dreams never fade
Flap Flap is the hero, in the dark and the shade!

Follow the sound, trust the voice in the air
Hope is protected, we just gotta care!

The rhythm of wings, yeah, the beat of the soul
Flap Flap forever makes Alasol whole!

Trust the flutter! Believe in your dreams!
Flap Flap! Flap Flap! The light now streams!

name: The Lost Fragment
lyrics:
Deep in the cave where the crystal gleamed bright
Guardians lived in the eternal light

Harmony flowing, a knowledge so free
The Heart of the Earth, it anchored the sea

Of energy pure, life was a song
But silence crept in, where did it go wrong?

A shattering shock, a legendary piece
Vanished one morning, shattering peace

Drought took the caverns, the darkness descends

The lifeline was severed, the connection it ends
Lira stood fearless, a fire in her eyes

She grabbed the old map, beneath the dead skies
One young soul to mend the fractured design

To chase the lost fragment, 
to make the light shine!

Gotta find the Fragment, gotta feel the beat!
The Heart of the Earth is beneath my feet!

Through winding rivers, past the shadows cold
A story of courage that must be told!

We break the silence, we conquer the fear
The light will return when the crystal is near!

Oh, the Lost Fragment, it calls out my name
To save the whole world and restart the flame!

Labyrinths twisting, a challenge for the mind
But strength comes from trials, the wisdom I find

A bat with a secret, a glow-creature dim
We built up a crew, a formidable team

We faced the dark creatures, 
solved every tight riddle

Learned that the answer is right in the middle
Of willpower and friendship,

the ties that still bind
Leaving the darkness and shadows behind!

Gotta find the Fragment, gotta feel the beat!
The Heart of the Earth is beneath my feet!

Through winding rivers, past the shadows cold
A story of courage that must be told!

We break the silence, we conquer the fear
The light will return when the crystal is near!

Oh, the Lost Fragment, it calls out my name
To save the whole world and restart the flame!

In the final chamber, the enigmatic gaze
A test of pure wisdom through the ancient maze

Not strength of the sword, 
but the strength of the heart

To play the full role and fulfill my part
Compassion and bravery, the ultimate keys

Brought down the warden, set the crystal at ease!
The piece clicks in place,

the world starts to sing
The healing begins, the balance we bring!

Gotta find the Fragment, gotta feel the beat!
The Heart of the Earth is beneath my feet!

Through winding rivers, past the shadows cold
A story of courage that must be told!

We break the silence, we conquer the fear
The light will return when the crystal is near!

Oh, the Lost Fragment, it calls out my name
To save the whole world and restart the flame!

The light returned, the life is renewed
The promise of Lira, forever pursued

We stand on the legend, a lesson for all
To answer the call, before the great fall!

The Fragment is home!

name: The Light Gatherers
lyrics:
Sparkle in the dust, a tiny, fading sheen 
A world of gray, nothing in between.

The Collectors came, with bags of finest silk, 
Hoarding all the light, a bitter, blinding milk.

Old Man Grumbles, with a frown that never cracks, 
Stuffed his pockets full, ignoring all the facts.

Every single glow, every little gleam, Locked up 
tight inside a selfish, fading dream. The sun grew

pale, the flowers lost their hue, 'Cause when 
you take the joy, there's nothing left for you.

GATHER THE LIGHT, but don't you dare to keep 
it! Let the colors fly, let the world feel the

spirit. SHINE a little brighter, give it all away, 
A shared spark burns forever, come what may! It's

not in the holding, it's in the letting go, That's 
how the brightest magic starts to truly grow!

Little Lily watched, her eyes wide with surprise, 
Saw the grumpy faces beneath the barren skies. She

found a single spark, on a dew-kissed leaf, And 
didn't try to hide it, ignoring all their grief.

She blew a tiny kiss, and let the light expand, 
A wildfire of wonder, spreading through the land.

GATHER THE LIGHT, but don't you dare to keep 
it! Let the colors fly, let the world feel the

spirit. SHINE a little brighter, give it all away, 
A shared spark burns forever, come what may! It's

not in the holding, it's in the letting go, That's 
how the brightest magic starts to truly grow!

The bags burst open wide, a blinding, 
golden flood, The grumpy Collectors felt

a change in their blood. They learned the 
biggest truth, with a sudden, joyful tear:

The light you give away is the one that 
stays right here. Sharing is the sun,

and hoarding is the night, Now let your 
tiny flicker turn into a mighty light!

GATHER THE LIGHT, but don't you dare to keep 
it! Let the colors fly, let the world feel the

spirit. SHINE a little brighter, give it all away, 
A shared spark burns forever, come what may! It's

not in the holding, it's in the letting go, That's 
how the brightest magic starts to truly grow!

Shine! Shine! The world is getting 
bright! Shine! Shine! Share your

beautiful light! Yeah! Give 
it away! Let it shine today!

name: Bubbles of Pride
lyrics:
Electric blue, flashing through!
In Rainbow Village, where the sky is new!

Glitter and shine, the light is mine,
Meet Llamarada, the star of the line!

Feel the beat, can't be beat!
Get ready, world, for a fabulous feat!

My fur is fire, my coat is bright,
Spinning magic with all my might.

I don't just walk, I put on a show,
Watch the sparks and the tiny flames glow.

But my biggest trick, the ultimate splash,
Is crafting a bubble that moves in a dash!

A perfect orb of pure, dazzling sheen,
The proudest moment you've ever seen!

Oh, the Bubbles of Pride! They're flying high!
Shining, soaring, up to the sky!

They pop with color, they burst with cheer,
Banish the gray, banish the fear!

We are magnificent, we are bold,
A story in glitter, a tale to be told!

If you love who you are, let the whole world see,
Blow a Bubble of Pride, set your spirit free!

Grayscale arrived, a shadow on the scene,

Tried to steal the rainbow, tried to be mean.
Sucking up the joy, dimming every heart,

Trying to tear our whole bright world apart.
But Llamarada won't stand for that gloom,

We gotta banish the darkness, 
make the colors bloom!

Called up the fairies, the gnomes, and the crew,
Gotta make this bubble brilliant and new!

Oh, the Bubbles of Pride! They're flying high!
Shining, soaring, up to the sky!

They pop with color, they burst with cheer,
Banish the gray, banish the fear!

We are magnificent, we are bold,
A story in glitter, a tale to be told!

If you love who you are, let the whole world see,
Blow a Bubble of Pride, set your spirit free!

Took a deep breath, from my belly to my soul,
Focused the magic, let the pride take control!

The light was intense, the power untold,
A brilliant mirror, silver and gold!

Grayscale retreated, fading into mist,
Joy is the power you can't resist!

We stood together, a shining, loud parade,
The brightest, proudest choice we ever made!

We won, we won! The gray is gone!
Shout it out until the break of dawn!

Pride is the key, love is the way,
Blow a bubble, celebrate today!

Boom! Pop! Sparkle! Shine!
The Bubbles of Pride are eternally mine!

name: Stolen Moments
lyrics:
Shadow Fortress, midnight town, 
where the sun forgets to land.

Zac with silver, blue-fire crown, 
holds a lantern in his hand.

Whispers fading, a silent 
tear, memory starts to fray.

A crucial moment, year by year, 
they just vanished in the gray.

Used to laugh beneath the gloom, 
used to feel the joy and sting.

Now the mind is an empty room, 
lost the song they used to sing.

Fear is rising, sharp and fast, 
something took the sweetest parts.

Every precious thing from the past, 
ripping echoes from their hearts.

Zac steps out, he won't deny, 
gotta find the fading track.

Look the mystery in the eye, 
fight to bring the moments back.

Stolen Moments, crystal shard, 
flashing fast and slipping free.

Stolen Moments, working hard, 
just to prove what we can be!

The shadow creature, frail and 
strange, living on the joy it takes.

We will force a brand new change, 
for the love that memory makes!

We chase the past, we risk the 
light, fighting for the way we were.

Bring the colors back tonight, a 
shining, bright, nostalgic blur!

Into caverns deep we run, 
crystal walls begin to glow.

Saw the fading of the sun, 
heard a thousand voices flow.

Creature speaks in hollow 
tone, "If I stop, I disappear."

Standing utterly alone, fueled 
by sadness, fear, and cheer.

We need friendship, not the fight, 
a new purpose must be found.

Turn the darkness into light, 
spin the world to safer ground!

Stolen Moments, crystal shard, 
flashing fast and slipping free.

Stolen Moments, working hard, 
just to prove what we can be!

The shadow creature, frail and 
strange, living on the joy it takes.

We will force a brand new change, 
for the love that memory makes!

We chase the past, we risk the 
light, fighting for the way we were.

Bring the colors back tonight, a 
shining, bright, nostalgic blur!

Find the Orb of Eternal Echoes, 
ancient power starts to rise.

Feed the core with what the spirit 
knows, reflected in our knowing eyes.

Transformed by kindness, soft and 
clear, the darkness starts to fade away.

Every moment held so dear, comes 
flooding back, saved for today!

The true light always finds the 
door, what you give is what you keep!

Stolen Moments, crystal shard, 
flashing fast and slipping free.

Stolen Moments, working hard, 
just to prove what we can be!

The shadow creature, frail and 
strange, living on the joy it takes.

We will force a brand new change, 
for the love that memory makes!

We chase the past, we risk the 
light, fighting for the way we were.

Bring the colors back tonight, a 
shining, bright, nostalgic blur!

Oh, the light found its way through.
In the shadows, brave and true.

Moments stolen, now restored.
Memories forever poured!

The echo lives. The shadow's friend.
The past is safe until the end.

name: The Forgotten Street
lyrics:
In Lumina City, where the neon lights gleam
There's a whisper of shadows, a silent old dream

A lane tucked away, no cafe, no store
Just shuttered up windows and silence galore.

They rush right past it, absorbed and blind
Leaving the magic of the world behind!

Young Elio arrives, heart full of fire
Curious eyes that climb ever higher

The old house creaks low, the dust on the floor

He knows this is home, but 
he’s searching for more.

Then a map in the corner, aged paper and gold
A secret of ages, a story untold.

It shines with a symbol, a star-dusted trail
Right where the old streetlamp begins to fail!

Oh, the Forgotten Street, 
where the magic lies deep

The promises whispered that ancient secrets keep!

Look closer, look further, go past the gray wall
Where the forest appears and you answer the call!

This silent old corner is a portal of light
A magical gateway that opens at night!

Beyond the ordinary, the wonder is vast
The greatest adventure is finally here, fast!

Lantern in hand, past the houses he strides
The dark lamp is humming,

where the secret presides.
A soft bluish glow starts to push back the night

Revealing a pathway, all stardust and light.
The Path of the Stars,

through leaves thick and green
He follows the fireflies, a dazzling bright scene.

To the clearing he runs, to the ancient tree high
The Guardian is waiting beneath the moon sky!

Oh, the Forgotten Street, 
where the magic lies deep

The promises whispered that ancient secrets keep!

Look closer, look further, go past the gray wall
Where the forest appears and you answer the call!

This silent old corner is a portal of light
A magical gateway that opens at night!

Beyond the ordinary, the wonder is vast
The greatest adventure is finally here, fast!

The Guardian speaks, of a truth that is old

This street is the balance, 
more precious than gold.

A bridge for two worlds, a duty so grand
Now Elio must stand, protection in hand!

He came for adventure, he found his true place
A keeper of secrets, with wonder and grace!

Oh, the Forgotten Street, 
where the magic lies deep

The promises whispered that ancient secrets keep!

Look closer, look further, go past the gray wall
Where the forest appears and you answer the call!

This silent old corner is a portal of light
A magical gateway that opens at night!

Beyond the ordinary, the wonder is vast
The greatest adventure is finally here, fast!

So walk on by, let the crowds rush along
They miss the true magic, the magical song.

For the heart that is open, the pure and the brave
The Forgotten Street magic, forever will save!

Forever will save!

name: The Kraken's Cry
lyrics:
Deep in the dark, the village shivers,
Storm hits hard, the thunder delivers.

Tale of the deep, a sound like doom,
The Kraken's Cry fills every room!

Luca the brave, he couldn't hide,
Old man's fear, he pushed it aside.

Lantern flickers, coat buttoned tight,
"Valiente" sails into the night!

Waves crash high, the fog rolls fast,
The legend’s moment, built to last.

Heartbeat thumps, a nervous drum,
Hear the sound, the time has come!

OH-OH-OH! The mighty monster, 
they swore it was wicked!

OH-OH-OH! Tentacles waving, 
but colors were tricked!

It's not a growl, it's a giggle and splash,
A friendly giant in a vibrant flash!

The Kraken's Cry? It's a happy tune,
Just Kiko singing underneath the moon!

Massive shadow, rising slow,
From the abyss, a vibrant glow!

Not dark and dusty, brown and gray,
But rainbows dancing on the spray!

Luca reached out, took a deep breath,
Defying every myth of death.

The roaring sound? A gentle peep!
The world awoke from frightened sleep!

OH-OH-OH! The mighty monster, 
they swore it was wicked!

OH-OH-OH! Tentacles waving, 
but colors were tricked!

It's not a growl, it's a giggle and splash,
A friendly giant in a vibrant flash!

The Kraken's Cry? It's a happy tune,
Just Kiko singing underneath the moon!

Fear is a curtain, thick and gray,
Hiding the wonder that is ready to play.

Look closer, listen deep and clear,
A monster's roar is sometimes a cheer!

From 'unknown dread' to 'best friend' fast,
The biggest fear never had to last!

OH-OH-OH! The mighty monster, 
they swore it was wicked!

OH-OH-OH! Tentacles waving, 
but colors were tricked!

It's not a growl, it's a giggle and splash,
A friendly giant in a vibrant flash!

The Kraken's Cry? It's a happy tune,
Just Kiko singing underneath the moon!

Nublamar smiles, the truth is clear,
No more running, no more fear!

Kiko's song, the sweetest sound,
The friendly Kraken has been found!

Playful twist, adventure bold,
The best story ever told!

name: Spectral Stella
lyrics:
Stella, stella, spectral light, 
floating high above the night.

Saw her shadow, thin and long, 
felt like something was all wrong.

Tried to hide it, tight and deep, 
made a promise she would keep:

"Be invisible, don't shine, 
this bright feeling isn't mine!"

Every day she dimmed her glow, 
hoping no one else would know.

Shine! shine! spectral light! 
don't you hide your inner might!

Bright! bright! all night! 
step into the true sunlight!

Spectral stella, hear the call! 
you are ready to stand tall!

Shine! shine! don't you fall! 
show your sparkle to them all!

Met a friend who saw her gleam, 
said, "don't dim your vibrant stream!

Being different is the prize, 
look right into your own eyes.

You're a wonder, bright and 
bold, a new story to unfold."

Shine! shine! spectral light! 
don't you hide your inner might!

Bright! bright! all night! 
step into the true sunlight!

Spectral stella, hear the call! 
you are ready to stand tall!

Shine! shine! don't you fall! 
show your sparkle to them all!

Embrace the glow, don't let it fade, 
the brightest future you have made.

From a whisper to a roar, she 
shines brighter than before!

This is your light, this is your 
time, break the fear and truly climb!

Shine! shine! spectral light! 
don't you hide your inner might!

Bright! bright! all night! 
step into the true sunlight!

Spectral stella, hear the call! 
you are ready to stand tall!

Shine! shine! don't you fall! 
show your sparkle to them all!

Shine! shine! spectral light! 
don't you hide your inner might!

Bright! bright! all night! 
step into the true sunlight!

Spectral stella, hear the call! 
you are ready to stand tall!

Shine! shine! don't you fall! 
show your sparkle to them all!

Shine your light! spectral bright!
No more hiding in the night!

Be yourself! be the best!
Put your true self to the test!

name: Primordial Burst
lyrics:
The Starfall wood is weeping, 
shadows long and thin

A velvet coat, a button soul, 
where life refused to spin

But on the night the emeralds 
crashed, a flash, a wicked green

The straw-stuffed heart gave one tight thump,

the world was freshly seen!
He walked! He walked!

Oliver the Scarecrow, wired, wild, and strange

Pulled his wooden feet right 
out of the rye field's range

No more the post of silent dread, 
no more the feathered fright

I've got the spark of destiny, 
charged by meteor light!

Top hat cocked and tipping 
low, a tremor in the lace

I'm rattling down the forest 
path, to find my rightful place!

The moon is fat, the air is 
cold, the journey has begun

I trade the boredom of the 
patch for the power of the Sun!

Oh, the Primordial Burst, a crack in the dark!

The life they said I couldn't 
have, ignited by a spark!

I'm a patchwork king, a moving 
thing, with courage in my chest

I tear the stitches of my fate, 
and put my soul to the test!

From hay and hemp and lonely 
nights, I burst into the day

The whispering wind can't hold 
me down, I'm finding out my way!

If you can dream the wicked dream, 
the burst will make you real!

This frantic, frantic rhythm 
is the life I get to feel!

The ancient Oak of Elowen, 
he warned of twisted trails

Of Siren screams by churning 
streams, where every promise fails

He gave me patience, wisdom’s 
plea, a compass pointing safe

Through foggy mazes, fairy 
lies, and shadows on the waif

I sprinted past the singing 
traps, I laughed at all the tricks

A walking, talking tapestry 
of twigs and worn-out fix!

They tried to stop my onward 
march, to push me back to dust

But the meteor fire in my soul is 
driven by a lust! (For living!)

The Crystal Mountain, sharp and 
high, where fickle tempests play

To capture the most elusive gust,

and finally win the day!
(Chase, chase, chase!)

My silly top hat, what a tool! 
I scooped the wind up quick!

The spirit bowed, the challenge 
met, I did the spooky trick!

No longer just a static prop, 
I faced the roaring fear

The biggest blast of life you 
know, is the reason I am here!

Oh, the Primordial Burst, a crack in the dark!

The life they said I couldn't 
have, ignited by a spark!

I'm a patchwork king, a moving 
thing, with courage in my chest

I tear the stitches of my fate, 
and put my soul to the test!

From hay and hemp and lonely 
nights, I burst into the day

The whispering wind can't hold 
me down, I'm finding out my way!

If you can dream the wicked dream, 
the burst will make you real!

This frantic, frantic rhythm 
is the life I get to feel!

Hear the whisper, hear the drum!
The scarecrow's story has begun!

Oliver the legend! Never turn to straw!
Go chase the lightning, break the law!

low, a tremor in the lace

I'm rattling down the forest 
path, to find my rightful place!

The moon is fat, the air is 
cold, the journey has begun

I trade the boredom of the 
patch for the power of the Sun!
Oh, the Primordial Burst, a crack in the dark!

The life they said I couldn't 
have, ignited by a spark!

I'm a patchwork king, a moving 
thing, with courage in my chest

I tear the stitches of my fate, 
and put my soul to the test!

From hay and hemp and lonely 
nights, I burst into the day

The whispering wind can't hold 
me down, I'm finding out my way!

If you can dream the wicked dream, 
the burst will make you real!

This frantic, frantic rhythm 
is the life I get to feel!

The ancient Oak of Elowen, 
he warned of twisted trails

Of Siren screams by churning 
streams, where every promise fails

He gave me patience, wisdom’s 
plea, a compass pointing safe

Through foggy mazes, fairy 
lies, and shadows on the waif

I sprinted past the singing 
traps, I laughed at all the tricks

A walking, talking tapestry 
of twigs and worn-out fix!

They tried to stop my onward 
march, to push me back to dust

But the meteor fire in my soul is 
driven by a lust! (For living!)

The Crystal Mountain, sharp and 
high, where fickle tempests play
To capture the most elusive gust,

and finally win the day!
(Chase, chase, chase!)

My silly top hat, what a tool! 
I scooped the wind up quick!

The spirit bowed, the challenge 
met, I did the spooky trick!

No longer just a static prop, 
I faced the roaring fear

The biggest blast of life you 
know, is the reason I am here!
Oh, the Primordial Burst, a crack in the dark!

The life they said I couldn't 
have, ignited by a spark!

I'm a patchwork king, a moving 
thing, with courage in my chest

I tear the stitches of my fate, 
and put my soul to the test!

From hay and hemp and lonely 
nights, I burst into the day

The whispering wind can't hold 
me down, I'm finding out my way!

If you can dream the wicked dream, 
the burst will make you real!

This frantic, frantic rhythm 
is the life I get to feel!

Hear the whisper, hear the drum!
The scarecrow's story has begun!

Oliver the legend! Never turn to straw!
Go chase the lightning, break the law!

name: The Journey of the Traveling Cloud
lyrics:
Look up, way up, where the big blue bends
A wispy wonder, a tale that never ends

Nimbus is floating, a silver ship on high
Changing the game in the endless, open sky.

I'm the master of the air, 
spinning forms that swiftly fly

Not just a droplet waiting to descend and sigh
From a fierce lion's roar to a smooth,

smiling face
I travel the globe, leaving magic in my trace

I teach the young ones how to 
dance, how to dream and grow

Look down at the deserts, watch 
the frozen mountains glow.

Oh, cloud, traveling cloud, 
the wind is my steering wheel!

Floating high, floating 
free, that's the way I feel!

Look for your purpose, little 
one, and make your dreams real!

The traveling cloud! (The traveling cloud!)

They ask me what's the 
mission, why I never rain below

I tell them knowledge travels 
fast, it helps the spirit flow

I was a ship over the ocean, 
a dragon in the breeze

Telling tales of cities and 
the ancient, quiet trees

But every grand adventure 
finds a final, deep desire

To give back the water, fuel 
the land with vital fire.

Oh, cloud, traveling cloud, 
the wind is my steering wheel!

Floating high, floating 
free, that's the way I feel!

Look for your purpose, little 
one, and make your dreams real!

The traveling cloud! (The traveling cloud!)

Listen closely to the gentle, soft descent
This is not ending, it’s a life well-spent

I’m falling as rain, a million drops of light
My spirit stays soaring, teaching what is right

Look for my memory in the shapes you see again.

Oh, cloud, traveling cloud, 
the wind is my steering wheel!

Floating high, floating 
free, that's the way I feel!

Look for your purpose, little 
one, and make your dreams real!

The traveling cloud! (The traveling cloud!)

Through the vast blue sky, the journey never stops

Just watch the clouds for the wisdom of the drops
The traveling cloud, forever high above...

name: The Flight of the Crystal Bird
lyrics:
He is Zafir, pure starlight made,
Last of his kind, unafraid.
Tears of the moon on a frosty breeze,
Protecting the talking stones and trees.
At the Tower of Dawn, his melody starts,
A rhythm of magic for forgotten hearts.

CRYSTAL BIRD! SHINE so BRIGHT!
Power of ICE! MAGIC is light!
WING of Glass! FAST and FREE!
SAVE the WORLD! For ALL to SEE!

Little Elián, with a heart so brave,
Defied the warnings that Alia gave.
Climbed the fog, where the whispers sleep,
A promise of magic he longed to keep.
Found Zafir glowing in the rising sun,
The quest for the ancient knowledge was won!

CRYSTAL BIRD! SHINE so BRIGHT!
Power of ICE! MAGIC is light!
WING of Glass! FAST and FREE!
SAVE the WORLD! For ALL to SEE!

Now take the lesson, the balance restore,
We can't forget the wild magic anymore.
Carry the shimmer down to the ground,
Let the sound of the future be found.
Guard every whisper, protect every bloom,
Break the shadows that gather in gloom!

CRYSTAL BIRD! SHINE so BRIGHT!
Power of ICE! MAGIC is light!
WING of Glass! FAST and FREE!
SAVE the WORLD! For ALL to SEE!

Fly higher, Zafir, keep the legend bright,
The crystal bird reminds us to fight!
The magic lives on!

name: The Whisper of Time
lyrics:
Listen close to the wind that sighs,

The hour sings where the secret lies.
Noah knows the key, the moment waits on,

The melody of time must last till dawn.
Tick-tock, can we feel the deep rhythm?

He lives in Mirandor, a place of brittle light,
But a pulse of frantic fear

shattered the quiet night.
Grandma Lena taught him whispers,

the voice inside the breeze,
The ancient clock was failing,

trembling on its knees.
Its golden dust was

freezing, a breath held in the air,
A chilling, empty promise, a silent, deep despair.

Three trials for the balance, 
three secrets to pursue,

He carried the world's deep 
silence beneath the morning dew.

IT’S THE SILENCE THAT SINGS! THE RHYTHM OF SOUL!

Golden music making us whole!
Grab the Key! Find

the Dew! Let the magic run free!
SAVE THE BALANCE! FIGHT TO BE!

He faced the Cave of Echoes, 
where logic held the key,

A baffling, timeless riddle 
set his weary spirit free.

He walked among the silver blooms 
to catch the moon's soft tear,

Patience bought the Twilight 
Dew, dissolving every fear.

The final trial stood massive, 
the Oak with roots of stone,

It questioned human value, leaving him alone.

The Oak demanded purpose, the 
reason to repair the spell,

Noah spoke of simple moments 
and the stories they compel.

IT’S THE SILENCE THAT SINGS! THE RHYTHM OF SOUL!

Golden music making us whole!
Grab the Key! Find the Dew! Let

the magic run free!
SAVE THE BALANCE! FIGHT TO BE!

The Guardian whispered low: 
"They forget and turn to dust!

Why entrust them with the future, 
with a love they distrust?"

Noah's voice was firm: "Time is 
not a grant, it's what we give!

It's the space between the 
heartbeats, the promise how to live!

The balance is in listening! 
Not just to the sound!"

He placed the sacred items 
on the consecrated ground.

IT’S THE SILENCE THAT SINGS! THE RHYTHM OF SOUL!

Golden music making us whole!
Grab the Key! Find the

Dew! Let the magic run free!
WE WON THE BALANCE! NOW WE SEE!

Oh, the Whisper of Time...
Now the gift of minutes is yours and mine!

The sands are flowing, the song is clear,
Listen close, let the present appear.

name: The Murmur of Silence
lyrics:
In Whispering Village, a house soft and bright,
an attic holds tremors of secret light.

Not wind at the window, nor 
breeze through the door—

just a sound that grows real… and asks for more.

Nuc, the dreamer, follows the call,
seeking a haven for two through it all.

He opens a drawer of wood and old spice,
finds a tiny blue wizard in velvet and ice.

Zil shrank by mistake in a spell gone wrong,
yet wise as the stars, and fiercely strong.

They vow to restore what the magic erased—
a boy and a mage, by wonder embraced.

The Whisper of Silence will show you the way,
a friend’s steady glow never fades away.

It’s the map to the world, the one true key,
the vow in your soul you were born to see.

Hear the hush that your heartbeat confesses:
a dream’s quiet power knows no addresses.

They brew strange potions, burn scrolls to ash,
laugh through the chaos, make magic from crash.

Failed spells and smoke, 
but their bond only grows,

stronger than time, stronger than foes.
They seek the old rite beneath starlit skies,

that asks for stardust as sacrifice.
To the enchanted lake, with hope in their stride,

to heal the curse they can’t hide.

The Whisper of Silence will show you the way,
a friend’s steady glow never fades away.

It’s the map to the world, the one true key,
the vow in your soul you were born to see.

Hear the hush that your heartbeat confesses:
a dream’s quiet power knows no addresses.

Before the Keeper, the stardust descends:
«Ask for one wish—I’ll make it amend.

Shall your friend regain his rightful height,
or gift the world with clearer sight?»

Nuc looks at Zil, smiles through his tears:
«Magic means nothing if love disappears.

Let the wind carry our story afar—
let the whole world know who we are!»

The Whisper of Silence will show you the way,
a friend’s steady glow never fades away.

It’s the map to the world, the one true key,
the vow in your soul you were born to see.

Hear the hush that your heartbeat confesses:
a dream’s quiet power always returns to bless us.

Zil stays small, but Nuc tells it true:

this tale lives forever in all of you.
The whisper drifts in—it’s at your sill…

two friends’ quiet voices rise 
with the dawn, and always will.

name: Bladey: The Blade of Grass Who Dreamed of the Sky
lyrics:
Bladey, Bladey,
tiny blade of sun and dew,

eyes up high all day long…
wants to touch the clouds—so soft and true!

“Stay down here!” they whisper,
“Grass can’t fly, it’s just not done.”

But she stretches, slow and steady,
gazing at the sky’s bright blue.

She just knows there’s something lovely
up among the white and fluff—

something soft, and bright, and happy…
calling gently, “Come on up!”

Up, up, Bladey!
Flutterwing is on her way!

Up, up, don’t you worry—
sky is waiting, bright and gray!

Meadow shrinks beneath you,
clouds are close enough to hold…

One small blade with big dreams
is about to touch the sky—so bold!

Old Oak asks her softly:
“Why reach so far, my dear?”

“’Cause there’s beauty way up yonder—
I just need to feel it near!”

He calls his rainbow friend at dawn,
Flutterwing with wings so wide,

“Hop on, little dreamer—
let’s go touch the sky!” she cries.

Up, up, Bladey!
Flutterwing is on her way!

Up, up, don’t you worry—
sky is waiting, bright and gray!

Meadow shrinks beneath you,
clouds are close enough to hold…

One small blade with big dreams
is about to touch the sky—so bold!

She clings to wings that shimmer,
wind hums soft against her side,

earth becomes a green dot…
heaven opens, wide and wide!

She stretches out her tiniest leaf—
touches cloud, so cool and white!

“I did it!” she shouts with joy,
heart alight with pure delight!

Back below, she trembles:
“Clouds smell like rain and light!

And the world from way up high
is a dream that shines so bright!”

The other blades fall silent…
then look up, one by one.

And the tiniest one whispers:
“What if… I could… too?”

Bladey, Bladey…
touched the sky.

Bladey, Bladey…
made the meadow dream.

name: The Dance of Destiny
lyrics:
Nine P.M. strikes, the clock has made the sound
A drawer opens, and magic is unbound!

She's white and gentle, ready for her flight
Serenade hits the wind, ready for the night!

They saw her on the table, 
to wipe the breakfast mess

But her true destiny brought her true success

From the kitchen drawer to 
the breeze, see her rise!

She weaves pure wonder right before your eyes
She spins in the air, light and fast she twirls

Bringing peace and comfort 
to all the boys and girls

Serenade, dance right now! Serenade, take a bow!
The night lights up when she is dancing now!

White as the bright moon, soft 
as the night's own breeze,

She erases every fright with such perfect ease.

The fear goes away, the darkness cannot stay!
Serenade is weaving sweet dreams 'til the day!

Little Lia is crying, afraid to close her sight
Scared of the shadow in the middle of the night

Serenade appears, a whirlwind of pure grace
Calming the loneliness in this small, quiet space

She shows brave heroes soaring, dragons disappear
Stories made of fabric, wiping every tear

Serenade, dance right now! Serenade, take a bow!
The night lights up when she is dancing now!

White as the bright moon, soft 
as the night's own breeze,

She erases every fright with such perfect ease.
The fear goes away, the darkness cannot stay!

Serenade is weaving sweet dreams 'til the day!

Her legend spreads wide, no longer just a tale
From home to home she flies, she will not fail

She is the guardian of your sweet, sleeping hours
A true heroine with such quiet powers

She brings the promise: light always returns
A tiny piece of fabric, a lesson softly learns

Serenade, dance right now! Serenade, take a bow!
The night lights up when she is dancing now!

White as the bright moon, soft 
as the night's own breeze,

She erases every fright with such perfect ease.

The fear goes away, the darkness cannot stay!
Serenade is weaving sweet dreams 'til the day!

Sleep in peace, rest your head, 
'til the sunshine hits your bed

Serenade will guard your 
heart 'til the morning starts.

The Dance of Destiny... The Dance of Destiny...

Dance right now! Dance right 
now! Serenade, take a bow!

name: The Red Moon
lyrics:
Crimson glow tonight. The village holds 
its breath. The shadows dance in fright,

ignoring fear of death. A giant disc 
in the sky, unblinking big and wide.

Underneath that watchful eye, 
there's nowhere left to hide.

Tino the cat. He walks onto a nervous jumpy tabby. 
Kept his routine simple and true. Avoiding things

too scary. But a strange sound on the breeze. 
A whisper pulling near. Awakening deep unease

confirming Tino's fear. He sees a shape 
fluid and dark slipping through the trees,

leaving its elusive mark riding on the crazy 
breeze. Red moon look painting everything

bright. My heart is pounding. He should 
be in his bed. The shadow is swift. Oh,

a monster of the night. It's a terrible 
gift stepping into the light. Red

from the haze. Red. Lost inside the maze.

To the old mill where the stories said the 
gears still turn alone. Past the fence where

the sleepy dead have made their quiet home. 
He pushes the door. A painful long protesting

creek. The air is thick, the silence strong. 
Tino cannot speak. The figure disappears,

absorb into the wall, challenging 
all his years. Tino stands up tall,

red moon, painting everything bright. My heart 
is pounding. He should be in his bed. Oh,

the shadow is swift, but a monster of the 
night. It's a terrible gick stepping into

the light. Red, red, running from the 
hay. Red, red, lost inside the hay.

Then the filter of light through the dusty 
ancient glass revealed the truth that night,

making the tension pass. A 
wavy mirror standing high,

reflecting back the fright. The scariest 
shadow that went by was Tino in the light.

H. What a goofy, silly smile. The mystery was

done. Fear was just silly 
for a while. A victory t1

name: The Endless Path
lyrics:
Sunny spot, old oak tree, the colony’s alive!

Tiny feet on the ground, 
hitting the deadline drive.

Order and the hustle, efficiency defined,
But Ada, the small worker, left her senses behind.

Meet Ada the ant, quick in 
mind, slow on the route,

A dreamer, a wanderer, forever checking out.
One flash of yellow light,

a butterfly’s bright grace,
She spun around and followed,

left the perfect place.
Now the leaves are shaking,

shadows look so strange,
But Ada found a doorway, ready for a change.

She faced the open trail, 
the wide, unknown terrain,

To find a hidden lesson, and 
forget the work and strain!

This is the Endless Path, every step is a light!
The world feels brand new,

let's learn how to be bright!
No detour is wrong, no stumble is bad,

Find your adventure now, the 
best trip you’ve ever had!

The Endless Path, oh, the steps are so loud,
Singing a new rhythm, home is waiting now!

Keep moving forward, we 
know where we’re going now!

(Verse 2)

First, the Snail rolled up, 
shell glistening with dew,

Said, "Go slow, little 
friend, there's a wider view.

If you never stop moving, 
you will always get there,"

Wisdom from a creature who moves without a care!

Then the Cricket sprang by, 
playing a loud, joyful tune,

"Laughter is the bridge, sing beneath the moon!
Music in the maze is the language of your soul,"

Tiny feet are dancing now, back in full control!
She took their honest counsel,

and she started to smile wide,
Knowing that the answers were always deep inside.

This is the Endless Path, every step is a light!
The world feels brand new,

let's learn how to be bright!
No detour is wrong, no stumble is bad,

Find your adventure now, the 
best trip you’ve ever had!

The Endless Path, oh, the steps are so loud,
Singing a new rhythm, home is waiting now!

Keep moving forward, we 
know where we’re going now!

Met the ancient Tortoise, 
eyes that shone like gold,

The patient gaze of ages, a story to be told.
He spoke of small persistence, a quiet,

steady pace,
"Home is closer

than you think, after this long race!"
The journey of discovery, personal and true,

The mistake was the teacher, 
showing something new!

She grasped the final meaning, 
the wisdom from the breeze,

She marched back to the colony, 
singing through the trees.

This is the Endless Path, every step is a light!
The world feels brand new,

let's learn how to be bright!
No detour is wrong, no stumble is bad,

Find your adventure now, the 
best trip you’ve ever had!

The Endless Path, oh, the steps are so loud,
Singing a new rhythm, home is waiting now!

Keep moving forward, we 
know where we’re going now!

Ada is back!
With stories and song!

The endless path,
is where we belong!

The best adventure starts right 
here! With faith and heart!

name: The Withered Star
lyrics:
In Twilight Vale, the shadows softly rise,
Mountains pierce the sky,

and silence fills the skies.
Zely stands alone on stone worn thin by time—

Star Keeper bound by oath, 
his heart in silent rhyme.

The heavens dim… a light begins to fade.
Alheri, Hope’s own flame, is losing shade.

He scans the frozen canvas of the night,
Sees Alheri dimmed by unseen blight.

The telescope trembles in his trembling hand—
Fear like frost across this sacred land.

With Noctis at his side—a shadow, wise and deep—
He walks where ancient forests weep and sleep.

Through whispers in the wind, 
beneath a starless dome,

He seeks the sages, far from home.

The withered star… it aches inside my chest.
Not lost in sky—but in the grief I’ve pressed.

No hand can heal what I refuse to show:
My breath is her light—I must let it glow.

The shadow I fight is the one I hold.
To save her fire, I must grow bold.

Shine, fragile hope—awaken what is true.
If I am dark… then light will fade from you.

The sages spoke in voices soft and old:
“The star you mourn is your own soul, untold.

Your hidden sorrow, dreams you cast aside,
Became the storm that dimmed her sacred tide.

The weight you bore was never hers to keep—
It was your silence that made the heavens weep.”

He turned from mountain peaks, no longer blind—
To find the light in simple things, left behind.

The withered star… now mirrors all my skin.
Not space, but sorrow dims the light within.

The truth is clear, the path is real:
My breath is her light—my heart, her wheel.

I traded tears for laughter, fear for grace,
Found dawn in children’s eyes, in time, in space.

Shine, fragile hope—rekindle what was torn.
I am the light… and now I’m not alone.

In birdsong at first light, 
in stories by the flame,

In quiet moments, love reclaimed his name.
The shadow thinned—it never ruled his core.

Each sunrise now is something more.
No longer just a keeper… now a flame.

The journey ends—but light remains.

The withered star… now burns inside my soul!
No fear can quench it—only make it whole.

I found the beauty I had turned away:
My breath is her light—I live it every day.

The shadow I fought? I let it go.
To save her fire, I learned to grow.

Shine, radiant heart—the vow is kept.
The star is whole… and never slept.

Oh, Alheri… you glow at last.
My pulse, your light—forever cast.

No more twilight.
Only dawn.

Shine with me…
Forever on.

name: The Tangle of Secrets
lyrics:
Kingdom of Pillow, moonlight glows so bright,
Dream-weaving gnomes are stitching dreams tonight.

Ziggy is the hero—he sees what’s not the norm,
Chasing the mystery… to break the fatal knot!

Astronauts’ dreams spin upon the loom,
When a glowing knot begins to boom.

A magic bond with vital light—
All the kingdom’s secrets held so tight!

It grows and tightens, endless fear in sight—
Find the center now, tear the web with might!

His mission’s clear, his heart won through:
He’ll save each mind the Tangle trapped anew!

OH, THE TANGLE OF SECRETS—CHAOS EVERYWHERE!
Fear in the shadows, silence cold and bare.

PULL! UNRAVEL! Be brave, don’t stop!
Only the truth can heal and lift us up.

FACE THE KNOT! Let the rhythm rise,
Untie your fear—and peace will fill the skies!

A cloud-pouch packed with tools galore,
A truth-telling mirror, starlight at its core.

Whispering woods and misty bridges span,
Each trial a challenge—light defeats the dark.

He crossed each threshold, 
climbed and then came down,

Seeking the secret that held the whole town.

The journey was hard, but his faith held strong—
He shielded all dreams from fear’s cruel throng!

OH, THE TANGLE OF SECRETS—CHAOS EVERYWHERE!
Fear in the shadows, silence cold and bare.

PULL! UNRAVEL! Be brave, don’t stop!
Only the truth can heal and lift us up.

FACE THE KNOT! Let the rhythm rise,
Untie your fear—and peace will fill the skies!

Tjo! Tjo! In the fjell of dreams, 
the shadow’s dense and deep,

The essence whispers: “Will 
my soul forget to dream?”

The fear of being lost—that’s the root of pain,
But Ziggy speaks with love, again, again:

“I swear, I swear—your dreams will never fade,
No thread will break while we hold them safe!”

The great knot softens, threads begin to flow,
With courage and promise… all souls bloom anew!

OH, THE TANGLE OF SECRETS—CHAOS EVERYWHERE!
Fear in the shadows, silence cold and bare.

PULL! UNRAVEL! Be brave, don’t stop!
Only the truth can heal and lift us up.

FACE THE KNOT! Let the rhythm rise,
Untie your fear—and peace will fill the skies!

Tangle tamed! No more fear today!
Ziggy weaves dreams in the gentlest way.

If fear wraps ‘round you, hear his call:
“Untie your soul… and fly—unbound,

free, and tall.”
(whisper) …freedom.

name: The Whispering Forest
lyrics:
Sunrise breaks the snow-capped peak,
A secret legend starts to speak.

Elian, heart of gold and fire,
Drawn by ancient tree-high spire.

Grandma’s tales beside the fire,
Filling curious heart’s desire.

Compass packed and honey jar,
Venturing further, going far.

Silent paths where few would tread,
Listening to what the forest said.

Breeze became a chilling word:
“Brave,” “Wish,” “Careful”—clearly heard!

OH, THE WHISPERING FOREST, 
WHERE THE SECRETS RUN DEEP!

EVERY ANCIENT TREE HAS A PROMISE TO KEEP.
DREAM CRYSTAL SHINES, A WISH IN THE HAND,

BUT THE TREASURE IS THE 
JOURNEY ACROSS THIS WILD LAND!

FEEL THE RHYTHM, HEAR THE RHYME,
WALKING OUT OF SPACE AND TIME!

Shadows move, a silver flash…
It’s Lumi, the fox in a dash!

He leaps, a trusty friend so bright,
Guiding Elian with the light.

Ferns are singing, clear and loud,
Leading gently through the wood.

No more wandering all alone—
Wonders waiting to be shown!

OH, THE WHISPERING FOREST, 
WHERE THE SECRETS RUN DEEP!

EVERY ANCIENT TREE HAS A PROMISE TO KEEP.
DREAM CRYSTAL SHINES, A WISH IN THE HAND,

BUT THE TREASURE IS THE 
JOURNEY ACROSS THIS WILD LAND!

FEEL THE RHYTHM, HEAR THE RHYME,
WALKING OUT OF SPACE AND TIME!

Clearing reached, the sun explodes—
Where the golden diamond glows.

A calm voice echoes, soft and low:
“Don’t wish just for yourself alone.”

He saw the wonder, pure and true,
Then made a choice both kind and wise:

One selfless wish, a heartfelt plea:
“Keep the magic wild and free!”

OH, THE WHISPERING FOREST, 
WHERE THE SECRETS RUN DEEP!

EVERY ANCIENT TREE HAS A PROMISE TO KEEP.
DREAM CRYSTAL SHINES, A WISH IN THE HAND,

BUT THE TREASURE IS THE 
JOURNEY ACROSS THIS WILD LAND!

FEEL THE RHYTHM, HEAR THE RHYME,
THE MAGIC LIVES IN YOUR OWN HEART!

The crystal shatters into light,
Leaving wonder, day and night.

The good wish, strong and full of cheer,
For all the children, year by year.

The forest sings forevermore—
Its magic lives inside your door!
